title: Momentum Financial Infrastructure: Unlocking Revolutionary Trading for All Assets
body: BitcoinWorld Momentum Financial Infrastructure: Unlocking Revolutionary Trading for All Assets Are you ready for a truly transformative shift in how we perceive and trade digital assets? The world of blockchain is constantly evolving, and at its forefront, projects like Momentum are redefining what‚Äôs possible. Momentum, often abbreviated as MMT, isn‚Äôt just another crypto exchange; it‚Äôs outlining a bold vision to become the foundational Momentum financial infrastructure for every asset imaginable, whether digital or real-world. Momentum‚Äôs Vision for Financial Infrastructure: A New Era During a recent Bitcoin World Night Live (CNL) AMA session on Telegram, Nick Lee, head of marketing at Momentum, shed light on this ambitious goal. He explained that Momentum is designed as a powerful liquidity and trading engine. This engine is strategically built upon the high-performance Sui (SUI) blockchain. Its core purpose is straightforward: to facilitate the seamless trading of all assets, truly embracing the coming era of tokenization. Momentum aims to function as essential Momentum financial infrastructure for the era of tokenization, rather than just an exchange. This distinction is vital. An exchange typically focuses on asset swapping, but infrastructure provides the underlying framework and services that enable an entire ecosystem to thrive. Momentum aims to be that foundational layer. The Three Pillars of Momentum Financial Infrastructure Momentum‚Äôs approach to becoming comprehensive financial infrastructure isn‚Äôt just talk; it‚Äôs built on a robust, three-pronged strategy. These components work in synergy to create an ecosystem that is secure, compliant, and highly liquid. Let‚Äôs break down how Momentum achieves this: Security Layer: Institutional-Grade Protection with MSafe At the heart of Momentum‚Äôs offering is its commitment to security. They leverage the Move-based multi-signature wallet, MSafe. This provides institutional-grade security, ensuring that assets and transactions are protected with the highest standards. It‚Äôs about building trust in a decentralized world. Compliance Layer: Bridging Real-World Assets with Momentum X Recognizing the growing importance of regulated digital assets, Momentum introduces Momentum X. This component acts as a vital bridge, connecting real-world assets (RWAs) with a regulation-friendly framework. It‚Äôs crucial for fostering broader institutional adoption and ensuring a legitimate path for tokenized assets. Trading Layer: Fueling Liquidity on Momentum DEX The final piece is the Momentum DEX, their decentralized exchange. This is where the magic of trading happens. By facilitating a virtuous cycle of liquidity, the DEX ensures efficient and fair price discovery for all listed assets. More liquidity means better trading experiences for everyone. Why Momentum is Pioneering a New Paradigm Imagine a future where any asset ‚Äî from real estate and art to company shares and commodities ‚Äî can be easily tokenized, traded, and managed on a single, secure platform. This is the vision Momentum is working towards. By integrating security, compliance, and deep liquidity, they are setting the stage for a new paradigm in global finance. This approach addresses some of the biggest challenges facing the tokenization space today, including regulatory uncertainty and the need for robust asset protection. The comprehensive suite of tools is designed to attract both retail and institutional participants, offering them a reliable and efficient way to interact with tokenized assets. A Glimpse into the Future of Momentum Financial Infrastructure The integration of MSafe for security, Momentum X for compliance, and the Momentum DEX for trading creates a powerful synergy. This comprehensive suite of tools is designed to attract both retail and institutional participants, offering them a reliable and efficient way to interact with tokenized assets. As the world moves towards a more digital and interconnected financial landscape, the need for robust Momentum financial infrastructure becomes paramount. Momentum is positioning itself as a pivotal player in the future of finance. By building a comprehensive liquidity and trading engine on the Sui blockchain, complete with institutional-grade security and a clear path for regulatory compliance, they are laying the groundwork for the widespread adoption of tokenized assets. Their vision extends beyond simple trading; it‚Äôs about creating the essential financial backbone for a truly interconnected, asset-agnostic digital economy. This pioneering effort could fundamentally reshape how we interact with value globally. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Momentum (MMT)? A1: Momentum (MMT) is a project building a liquidity and trading engine on the Sui blockchain, designed to enable the trading of all assets and function as core financial infrastructure for the tokenization era. Q2: What is the Sui blockchain‚Äôs role in Momentum? A2: Momentum is built on the Sui (SUI) blockchain, leveraging its high-performance capabilities to create a robust and efficient platform for trading and managing tokenized assets. Q3: How does Momentum ensure security and compliance? A3: Momentum integrates a security layer using the institutional-grade MSafe multi-signature wallet and a compliance layer through Momentum X, which connects real-world assets with a regulation-friendly framework. Q4: What does ‚Äúfinancial infrastructure for all assets‚Äù mean? A4: It means Momentum aims to provide the foundational systems and services that enable any asset ‚Äî digital or real-world ‚Äî to be tokenized, traded, and managed securely and compliantly on its platform, rather than just facilitating simple cryptocurrency swaps. Q5: How does Momentum differ from a typical crypto exchange? A5: Unlike a typical exchange focused solely on trading, Momentum aims to be a complete financial infrastructure, offering integrated solutions for security, compliance, and liquidity to support the broader tokenization of all asset classes. title: Tech giants spend $80B on AI as Wall Street divides over payoff timeline
body: Three of the world‚Äôs biggest technology companies just spent close to 80 billion dollars on artificial intelligence systems in the past three months, but Wall Street had very different opinions about their plans to keep spending even more. Alphabet saw its stock price jump nearly 7%¬†after trading hours Wednesday when the company behind Google announced it would increase its spending plans for 2025 by 8 billion dollars to reach 93 billion dollars. The company also reported it brought in 100 billion dollars in quarterly revenue for the first time ever. Meta painted a different picture. The social media giant‚Äôs stock dropped almost 9%, which could erase around 160 billion dollars from what the company is worth when markets opened Thursday. Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs firm said its AI spending might go beyond 100 billion dollars next year. Dec Mullarkey, who helps manage 300 billion dollars at SLC Management, said the different reactions show how closely investors are watching to see when AI investments will actually make money. ‚ÄúInvestors are worried that the rush to grab market leadership may cause an overshoot,‚Äù Mullarkey explained as reported by FT. ‚ÄúNo one needs reminding that history is full of episodes of technology exuberance that eventually left the early investors battered.‚Äù Microsoft faces skepticism despite strong results Microsoft also saw its shares fall 4% this week, even though the company beat profit predictions and its Azure cloud business saw revenue jump 39%. The company just became the third ever to be valued at more than 4 trillion dollars after settling its partnership arrangement with OpenAI. Microsoft said it spent 35 billion dollars in the quarter, a 74% jump from last year and 5 billion dollars more than experts expected. Company leaders said spending could reach nearly 140 billion dollars next year. Chief executive Satya Nadella told financial analysts that Microsoft is building cloud systems at ‚Äúplanet scale‚Äù and wants to double the size of its data center operations over the next two years. Google and Microsoft had an easier time convincing investors that their massive spending on computer chips, data centers and electricity would pay off, partly because both companies sell cloud computing services to other businesses. Sundar Pichai, Google‚Äôs chief executive, said the Gemini App now has 650 million people using it each month, up from 450 million in July. That number is getting closer to ChatGPT‚Äôs 800 million users. Pichai also pointed out that the company‚Äôs cloud division grew because of ‚Äúenterprise AI products, which are generating billions in quarterly revenues.‚Äù Google has 155 billion dollars worth of computing service orders waiting to be filled. Search advertising, Google‚Äôs main moneymaker, grew 15%. This helped calm fears that ChatGPT is stealing users and that AI might hurt traditional search business. Angelo Zino, who analyzes companies for CFRA Research, said the results show Google is successfully adding AI to its advertising systems. ‚ÄúGoogle‚Äôs ability to maintain margins while scaling AI infrastructure demonstrates effective use of spending,‚Äù Zino noted. Meta defends spending on superintelligence quest As Cryptopolitan reported, Zuckerberg had a harder time defending Meta‚Äôs enormous spending, which goes toward infrastructure the company uses itself rather than selling to others. Meta is racing to be the first to create artificial superintelligence. He argued it made sense ‚Äúto aggressively frontload building capacity.‚Äù Zuckerberg said any extra data center space could be used for Meta‚Äôs main advertising business, which he described as ‚Äúcompute starved.‚Äù Meta‚Äôs quarterly revenue rose 26% to 51.2 billion dollars, but investors were still unhappy. The company said its spending could hit 72 billion dollars by the end of this year and that increases would be ‚Äúnotably larger‚Äù in 2026, suggesting a number well above an earlier 105 billion dollar estimate. Zuckerberg has been attracting top engineers to his special ‚ÄúTBD‚Äù lab by offering compensation packages worth hundreds of millions of dollars. Meta warned these salaries would significantly increase costs when full-year numbers come out. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Ethereum Developer Consensys Inches Closer To IPO: Report
body: Consensys, the Ethereum infrastructure firm best known for building the MetaMask wallet and the Infura developer toolkit, has quietly taken the next formal step toward going public, selecting JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs to lead work on a planned initial public offering, according to Axios. The move places one of the most systemically important companies in the Ethereum ecosystem on a path toward public market scrutiny and capital access after nearly a decade of operating as a privately held, founder-controlled Web3 software company. Ethereum‚Äôs Consensys Gears Up For IPO The reported bank mandate is the clearest signal so far that Consensys is positioning itself to test US equity markets in the post-2024 regulatory environment, and comes as crypto companies have re-opened the IPO window in 2025 after two years of near-total freeze. Axios reported that JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs have been tapped to run the offering, a role traditionally reserved for deals that are expected to command institutional interest at scale. While neither timeline nor targeted valuation has been formally disclosed, Axios indicated that Consensys is working toward a listing as early as 2026. Consensys did not confirm an imminent S-1 filing but acknowledged that it is actively evaluating capital markets options. ‚ÄúConsensys is constantly exploring opportunities to expand its impact,‚Äù the company told Decrypt when asked about the IPO report. ‚ÄúWhile we continuously evaluate strategic options for growth, we have nothing to announce at this time.‚Äù A Consensys IPO would be structurally different from the wave of crypto listings that defined the last cycle. Rather than a centralized exchange, a miner, or a pure-play trading proxy, Consensys is an infrastructure and tooling company embedded in Ethereum‚Äôs execution layer. The firm develops MetaMask, the self-custody wallet that has, for years, functioned as a default retail access point to Ethereum and EVM-compatible networks, and Infura, the backend service used by hundreds of thousands of developers to route blockchain queries and broadcast transactions without running their own nodes. MetaMask has been repeatedly described by Consensys as having tens of millions of monthly active users, and Infura processes billions of requests per day for applications that rely on reliable RPC infrastructure. That combination gives Consensys direct exposure to core on-chain activity rather than speculative token price action, which is likely to be a central part of the pitch to public market funds that want revenue tied to Ethereum‚Äôs usage rather than just its volatility. Regulatory posture is a critical part of that story. In February 2025, the US Securities and Exchange Commission informed Consensys that it would move to dismiss its lawsuit over MetaMask‚Äôs staking features , walking back allegations that the company had acted as an unregistered broker. The agency‚Äôs reversal effectively removed a material overhang on one of Consensys‚Äô most commercially sensitive products, and it did so against the backdrop of a broader softening in crypto enforcement tone under the Trump administration. Consensys last raised external capital in March 2022, when it closed a $450 million Series D led by ParaFi Capital with participation from Temasek, SoftBank‚Äôs Vision Fund 2, Microsoft, and others, valuing the company at roughly $7 billion post-money. The timing of Consensys‚Äô reported IPO push also lines up with a broader re-entry of crypto names into US public markets in 2025. Stablecoin issuer Circle listed in June at a valuation in the high single-digit billions, while exchange operator Bullish won a New York Stock Exchange listing in August. At press time, ETH traded at $3,907.

title: Wall Street‚Äôs Solana Bet Advances as Fidelity Updates ETF Filing
body: Fidelity Investments has filed a pre-effective amendment for its Solana ETF with the Securities and Exchange Commission, moving the registration toward automatic effectiveness. The filing reveals the fund will stake all its SOL holdings to generate returns exceeding the Fidelity Solana Reference Rate while charging a 0.25% annual fee, fully waived for the first six months after launch. This update pushes Fidelity into a rapidly expanding Solana ETF market , which has already seen three products debut on U.S. exchanges, capturing combined first-day inflows exceeding $81 million. According to the official filing, Fidelity has submitted an updated S-1 registration for its spot Solana ETF, removing the ‚Äúdelaying amendment,‚Äù which previously prevented the registration from becoming automatically effective and placed timing control in the hands of the SEC.‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) October 30, 2025 Fidelity Structures Aggressive Staking Strategy The Fidelity Solana Fund will stake up to 100% of its SOL tokens through custodians Anchorage Digital, BitGo, and Coinbase Custody, with node operators including Coinbase Crypto Services and Figment. Staking rewards will be subject to a 15% fee split among the sponsor, custodians, and operators, with the Trust expected to unstake SOL within two days when needed for redemptions. The fund will trade under ticker FSOL on an undisclosed exchange, offering creation and redemption baskets of 25,000 shares settled in either SOL or cash. To support this dual-settlement approach, Fidelity has secured trading agreements with counterparties, including Cumberland DRW, Jane Street Capital affiliates, and Virtu Americas, to facilitate cash creations. Despite the ambitious structure, the filing acknowledges substantial regulatory risk, noting the SEC has previously classified SOL as a security in enforcement actions. However, some cases have been dismissed or settled. The registration warns that a definitive security classification could trigger immediate material impact on SOL‚Äôs trading value and potentially force the fund‚Äôs liquidation. Bitwise Dominates Early Market While Fidelity prepares to enter, early movers have already claimed significant market share. Bitwise‚Äôs Solana ETF captured $69.5 million on its October 28 debut , nearly six times the $12 million raised by Rex-Osprey‚Äôs competing product. The Bitwise Solana Fund stakes 100% of holdings in-house to deliver the network‚Äôs full yield while charging a 0.20% management fee, waived for three months. Just one day later, Grayscale launched its Solana Trust ETF on NYSE Arca , converting a 2021-vintage private trust holding 525,387 SOL tokens. The fund carries a 0.35% expense ratio and stakes 74.89% of assets, passing 77% of staking rewards to investors on a net basis. @Grayscale launches Solana ETF on NYSE Arca, becoming the third U.S. product as institutional adoption of proof-of-stake blockchains accelerates. #Solana #ETF https://t.co/57ppRE2y1e ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) October 29, 2025 Meanwhile, Rex-Osprey‚Äôs SSK employs a hybrid structure holding 54% in direct Solana, 43.5% in a Swiss-listed CoinShares ETP, with the remainder in JitoSOL and cash. The fund distributes monthly staking rewards, which are treated as a return of capital for tax purposes, while charging a 0.75% expense ratio. Institutional Appetite Tests Layer 1 Power Balance Speaking with Cryptonews, Maria Carola, CEO of StealthEX, views the Solana ETF wave as a defining moment in blockchain competition. ‚Äú The launch of a spot ETF on Solana is a signal that has broken out in the protracted battle for dominance in the Layer 1 blockchain space, ‚Äù she said. ‚Äú For the first time, institutional investors are being invited to consider Solana as a standalone macro asset. ‚Äú Carola notes projections of $3 billion in ETF inflows over 12-18 months depend on Solana maintaining its 2024 momentum in DeFi expansion and network stability. ‚Äú Solana‚Äôs story is one of speed, scalability, and engineering precision, but for many market participants, it remains a symbol of short-term liquidity cycles and the fleeting hype of meme tokens,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAn ETF alone won‚Äôt change this perception overnight. ‚Äú She acknowledges Ethereum‚Äôs commanding position, with over $60 billion locked in DeFi and a mature staking ecosystem that continues to attract institutional capital seeking predictability. ‚Äú In the long term, it‚Äôs Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals, such as stability, institutional reputation, and integration into the global financial system, that maintain its leadership ,‚Äù Carola said. However, she proposes a coexistence model in which ‚Äú Ethereum serves as the underlying trust and settlement layer in the on-chain economy, while Solana becomes its high-performance execution engine. ‚Äú Despite positive sentiment around ETF launches, SOL‚Äôs near-term price action remains unclear. Polymarket gives Solana just a 25% chance (down 2% from yesterday) of reaching a new all-time high before 2026, with SOL trading at $196, up nearly 1% over 24 hours. Source: Polymarket Beyond U.S. markets, the Solana ETF momentum follows Hong Kong‚Äôs October approval of China Asset Management‚Äôs spot fund, which began trading on October 27 with a $100 minimum investment. The post Wall Street‚Äôs Solana Bet Advances as Fidelity Updates ETF Filing appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bybit to Pause New User Onboarding in Japan
Momentum Ecosystem: Unleashing Seamless Asset Trading for a Connected Future
body: BitcoinWorld Momentum Ecosystem: Unleashing Seamless Asset Trading for a Connected Future Imagine a world where every asset, whether a digital token or a physical property, can be traded and interconnected effortlessly. This is the ambitious future that Momentum (MMT) is actively building. At the heart of their mission is the creation of a powerful liquidity engine, designed to bring all assets into a seamless and unified Momentum ecosystem . This innovative approach promises to revolutionize how we perceive and interact with value, offering unprecedented fluidity in the global marketplace. What Drives the Vision for the Momentum Ecosystem? Nick Lee, Head of Marketing at Momentum, recently shared profound insights into this groundbreaking project during a Bitcoin World ‚ÄúAsk Me Anything‚Äù (AMA) session on Telegram. Lee articulated that Momentum is far more than just another trading platform; it represents a foundational infrastructure specifically engineered to ensure all assets can circulate and be traded without friction. This encompasses a vast spectrum, from popular cryptocurrencies to tangible real-world assets like real estate, commodities, and even intellectual property. The fundamental idea is to dismantle the traditional, often rigid, silos that have historically separated different asset classes. By achieving this, the Momentum ecosystem aims to unlock unprecedented levels of liquidity and operational flexibility for users across the globe. This transformative capability translates into several key advantages: Effortless Trading: Users can exchange any supported asset within the ecosystem with remarkable ease and speed. Universal Access: A single, intuitive platform provides comprehensive access to a diverse array of asset types. Enhanced Market Depth: Increased participation from both buyers and sellers leads to greater liquidity and fairer pricing. Reduced Friction: Streamlined processes minimize delays and complexities often associated with cross-asset transactions. Momentum‚Äôs vision extends beyond mere trading; it‚Äôs about creating a truly integrated financial landscape. How Will Momentum Achieve Fluid Asset Interconnection within its Ecosystem? The project‚Äôs name itself, ‚ÄúMomentum,‚Äù offers a compelling metaphor for its operational philosophy. It‚Äôs directly inspired by the financial market phenomenon where an initial surge of energy effectively leads to a sustained, powerful force. This dynamic, self-perpetuating system is precisely the kind of robust and resilient infrastructure the team is striving to establish within the Momentum ecosystem . To realize this vision, Momentum is meticulously constructing a robust and sophisticated infrastructure that underpins this fluid interconnection. It‚Äôs not simply about listing assets; it‚Äôs about creating an intelligent network where assets don‚Äôt just exist passively but actively flow, interact, and generate value. This infrastructure is being designed with paramount considerations for scalability, ensuring it can handle exponential growth in assets and user base, and security, safeguarding all transactions and holdings. The ultimate goal is to create a perpetual motion machine for value, where every transaction contributes to the overall strength and efficiency of the network. Consider the transformative possibilities this opens up: A digital artist could effortlessly trade their high-value NFT for a fractional ownership token representing a luxury property. An investor might leverage tokenized precious metals as dynamic collateral for a decentralized loan against their volatile cryptocurrency holdings, managing risk more effectively. Businesses could tokenise invoices or supply chain components, enabling real-time financing and greater transparency. These are just a few glimpses into the intricate and innovative possibilities that a truly interconnected Momentum ecosystem is poised to enable for a global audience. The Broader Impact of a Unified Momentum Ecosystem The implications of developing such a comprehensive and interconnected liquidity engine are profound and far-reaching. By effectively bridging the historical gap between disparate digital and real-world assets, Momentum has the potential to significantly enhance global market efficiency, transparency, and accessibility. This monumental shift could empower a much wider spectrum of individuals, from retail investors to large institutions, to actively participate in global markets, effectively transcending traditional geographical and entrenched financial barriers. However, embarking on such an ambitious and pioneering project naturally comes with its unique set of challenges. Key considerations include: Interoperability: Ensuring seamless communication and transaction capabilities across vastly different asset types. Robust Security: Implementing state-of-the-art cryptographic and network security measures to protect against vulnerabilities. Regulatory Navigation: Adapting to and complying with evolving regulatory landscapes across multiple jurisdictions. Momentum‚Äôs dedicated team is keenly focused on proactively addressing these complex aspects, committed to building a trustworthy, resilient, and compliant platform. The ultimate benefit lies in fostering a more dynamic, inclusive, and equitable financial future for everyone. The Momentum ecosystem promises to be a genuine game-changer, fostering unprecedented innovation and creating entirely new avenues for efficient value exchange on a global scale. In conclusion, Momentum is charting an exciting and transformative course toward a future where all assets are not only tradable but deeply interconnected within a single, powerful ecosystem. By developing a sophisticated liquidity engine and drawing profound inspiration from the very forces of sustained market momentum, MMT is poised to fundamentally transform how we interact with both digital and real-world value. This bold and visionary approach has the potential to unlock unparalleled opportunities for enhanced efficiency, greater accessibility, and groundbreaking innovation across global financial markets, heralding a new era of integrated finance. Frequently Asked Questions About the Momentum Ecosystem What is Momentum (MMT) and its core mission? Momentum (MMT) is a project focused on building a powerful liquidity engine to enable seamless trading and interconnection of all assets, both digital and real-world, within a unified ecosystem. Its core mission is to revolutionize how value is exchanged globally. What types of assets can be traded within the Momentum ecosystem? The Momentum ecosystem is designed to accommodate a wide range of assets, including cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and tokenized real-world assets such as real estate, commodities, and potentially even intellectual property, facilitating their fluid circulation and trading. How does Momentum ensure liquidity and interconnection for diverse assets? Momentum achieves this by building a robust and scalable infrastructure that acts as a liquidity engine. This infrastructure breaks down traditional silos, allowing different asset classes to interact and be traded effortlessly, inspired by the concept of sustained financial market momentum. What are the main benefits for users participating in the Momentum ecosystem? Users benefit from effortless trading, universal access to diverse asset types from a single platform, enhanced market depth, and reduced friction in transactions. This leads to greater efficiency, accessibility, and new opportunities for value exchange. How does Momentum address security and regulatory challenges? Momentum‚Äôs team is dedicated to implementing state-of-the-art security measures to protect assets and transactions. They are also focused on navigating and complying with evolving regulatory landscapes to build a trustworthy, resilient, and compliant platform for the global Momentum ecosystem . Did you find this exploration of the Momentum ecosystem‚Äôs vision insightful? Share this article with your network and join the conversation about the future of interconnected asset trading. Let‚Äôs spread the word about how Momentum is paving the way for a more fluid and accessible global financial landscape! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the cryptocurrency space and its future adoption . This post Momentum Ecosystem: Unleashing Seamless Asset Trading for a Connected Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin price today: retreats to $112.5k amid caution over Fed, Trump-Xi summit
Alleged Mastermind Behind $31M FINTOCH Exit Scam Arrested in Thailand
body: Thai authorities arrested Liang Ai-Bing, a Chinese national accused of orchestrating a $31 million crypto Ponzi scheme, at a luxury Bangkok residence on October 29, 2025. According to a local report , the arrest follows a coordinated intelligence operation between Thai and Chinese law enforcement targeting one of Asia‚Äôs most notorious digital currency fraud cases. Liang had been living alone in a three-story home office in Wang Thonglang district since December 2024, paying approximately $4,645 monthly in rent. Source: KhaosodEnglish Police discovered an unlicensed Beretta pistol and 20 rounds of ammunition during the raid, adding weapons charges to his alleged fraud activities. The FINTOCH Deception: A Multi-Million Dollar Fraud Network Chinese authorities allege Liang worked with four accomplices, Al Qing-Hua, Wu Jiang-Yan, Tang Zhen-Que, and Zuo Lai-Jun, to create FINTOCH between December 2022 and May 2023. The fraudulent platform promised investors 1% daily returns while falsely claiming ownership by investment giant Morgan Stanley. The scheme attracted victims across multiple Asian countries before collapsing spectacularly. The operation was methodically organized with distinct roles. Liang and Tang handled platform development while Al and Wu managed public relations and promotion. Zuo oversaw marketing operations before being arrested by Chinese authorities and released on bail, making him the only suspect who did not flee the country. The division of labor allowed the team to maintain a professional facade while systematically defrauding investors. On-chain investigator ZachXBT exposed the scheme‚Äôs collapse in May 2023, when the team exit-scammed, withdrawing 31.6 million USDT from Binance Smart Chain. It appears the team behind the ponzi @DFintoch has likely exit scammed with 31.6m USDT on BSC after the funds were bridged to multiple addresses on Tron/Ethereum and people reported being unable to withdraw Fintoch advertised 1% daily ROI & claimed to be owned by Morgan Stanley pic.twitter.com/UD3KKfkG97 ‚Äî ZachXBT (@zachxbt) May 23, 2023 The stolen funds were bridged across multiple addresses on Tron and Ethereum networks as investors simultaneously reported withdrawal failures. Both Singapore‚Äôs Monetary Authority and Morgan Stanley had issued public warnings about the scheme before its collapse, with Morgan Stanley explicitly stating it had no affiliation with FINTOCH and does not conduct business through social media or mobile applications. From Actors to Assets The FINTOCH operation employed sophisticated deception tactics that extended beyond traditional fraud methods. The website featured ‚Äú Bobby Lambert ‚Äù as CEO, though he was actually a paid actor with no connection to financial services. Source: Web Archive The fraudulent team even obtained a CertiK audit to lend legitimacy to their operation, exploiting investors‚Äô trust in third-party security assessments. The scheme held promotional events in Dubai in May 2023, attracting representatives from 19 countries and featuring purported blockchain experts lending false credibility. William, listed as Chairman of FINTOCH‚Äôs Board of Directors, announced plans for an FTC public chain and claimed the company would list on NASDAQ. Source: YahooFinance The event featured speeches by alleged representatives of the United Nations World Blockchain Group, which further enhanced the illusion of legitimacy. The fraud network later attempted to continue operations through rebranded projects. In October 2023, the same team launched FinSoul , a gaming platform that allegedly exit scammed another $1.6 million through market manipulation. Security firm CertiK identified identical executives between FINTOCH and the rebranded Standard Cross Finance, all of whom were confirmed as entertainment industry actors rather than financial professionals. The FinSoul token was deployed on BNB Smart Chain, trading at $0.39 before surging to $17.57, only to collapse to nearly zero within hours as the team drained $1.6 million in USDT from the liquidity pool. Justice Across Borders Liang now faces illegal firearm possession, ammunition charges, and illegal entry into Thailand as a foreign national. Thai authorities are coordinating extradition proceedings with Chinese officials, during which he could face charges related to defrauding nearly 100 victims of over 100 million yuan, approximately $14 million, according to Chinese reports. However, blockchain evidence suggests the total amount exceeded $31 million when international victims are included. Notably, Liang‚Äôs arrest comes amid an escalating wave of crypto-related fraud cases across Asia. Back in March, Thai authorities also apprehended Wu Di , a 27-year-old Chinese woman accused of stealing over $17.7 million through Facebook-based investment scams over two months. In fact, most recently, Zhimin Qian, another Chinese national in the UK, pleaded guilty to her role in the world‚Äôs largest crypto seizure , totaling more than $6.7 billion. A Chinese national has pleaded guilty to her role in the world‚Äôs largest crypto seizure, totaling more than ¬£5 billion ($6.7 billion). #China #Bitcoin https://t.co/3byVtWlilX ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) September 30, 2025 Qian masterminded an investment scam in China between 2014 and 2017, targeting over 128,000 victims before UK authorities seized 61,000 BTC. The post Alleged Mastermind Behind $31M FINTOCH Exit Scam Arrested in Thailand appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Urgent Alert: Upbit DOT Suspension Announced for Polkadot Network Transition
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent Alert: Upbit DOT Suspension Announced for Polkadot Network Transition Heads up, crypto enthusiasts! If you‚Äôre holding Polkadot (DOT) on Upbit, there‚Äôs an important announcement you need to know. The South Korean crypto exchange Upbit has officially confirmed a temporary Upbit DOT suspension for all deposits and withdrawals. This crucial move is set to begin at 3:00 a.m. UTC on November 4th. This temporary halt is due to an essential network transition, ensuring the long-term health and efficiency of the Polkadot blockchain. Why the Upbit DOT Suspension? Understanding Network Transitions The primary reason behind Upbit‚Äôs decision to implement the Upbit DOT suspension is a scheduled network transition for Polkadot. Think of a network transition as a significant upgrade or maintenance work on a highway. While inconvenient for a short period, it‚Äôs vital for improving performance, security, and scalability in the long run. These transitions often involve protocol changes that require exchanges to update their systems to remain compatible and secure. Enhanced Security: Upgrades can patch vulnerabilities and strengthen the network‚Äôs defenses. Improved Performance: Transitions might introduce new features that make transactions faster and more efficient. Future-Proofing: Ensuring compatibility with upcoming developments in the Polkadot ecosystem. What Does This Upbit DOT Suspension Mean for Polkadot Holders? For anyone holding Polkadot (DOT) on Upbit, this temporary suspension means you won‚Äôt be able to move your DOT in or out of the exchange during the specified period. It‚Äôs essential to plan any transactions accordingly. If you were planning to deposit DOT to Upbit or withdraw DOT from your Upbit account around November 4th, you will need to adjust your schedule. It is always a good practice to: Monitor Official Announcements: Keep a close eye on Upbit‚Äôs official channels for real-time updates. Plan Ahead: Complete any urgent DOT transactions before the suspension begins. Understand the Duration: While temporary, the exact duration isn‚Äôt always specified upfront. Actionable Steps Before the Polkadot Deposit and Withdrawal Halt Given the impending Upbit DOT suspension , proactive steps are key. If you need access to your DOT for trading, staking, or transferring to another wallet, ensure you complete these actions before 3:00 a.m. UTC on November 4th. Missing this window could mean your funds are locked on the exchange until services resume. Consider these actionable insights: Check Your Wallet: Verify your current DOT holdings on Upbit. Set Reminders: Mark the suspension time on your calendar. Alternative Platforms: If immediate DOT transactions are critical, explore other exchanges that support Polkadot, understanding the associated fees and KYC requirements. The Broader Impact of Upbit‚Äôs Polkadot Service Suspension While an Upbit DOT suspension specifically impacts Upbit users, such events highlight the dynamic nature of the cryptocurrency world. Exchanges play a crucial role in facilitating access to digital assets, and their operational adjustments, though temporary, can influence user behavior and short-term market sentiment for specific assets like Polkadot. However, network transitions are generally positive for the long-term health of a blockchain. This event underscores the importance of: Diversification: Not relying solely on one exchange for all your assets. Self-Custody: Considering hardware wallets for long-term storage of significant holdings. Staying Informed: Regular updates on blockchain developments and exchange policies. When Will Upbit DOT Services Resume? Upbit has stated that the suspension is temporary, but the exact duration for the Upbit DOT suspension is typically tied to the completion and successful verification of the Polkadot network transition. Users should expect Upbit to issue another official announcement once deposits and withdrawals are fully restored. It‚Äôs always wise to assume it might take a little longer than initially anticipated, as thorough testing is essential before reactivating services. Patience and vigilance are key during these periods. Trustworthy exchanges like Upbit prioritize the security of user funds, which means taking the necessary time to ensure all systems are functioning correctly post-transition. In conclusion, the temporary Upbit DOT suspension for deposits and withdrawals is a necessary measure for the Polkadot network‚Äôs upgrade. While it requires users to be mindful of the upcoming deadline, it ultimately contributes to a more robust and efficient blockchain ecosystem. Staying informed through Upbit‚Äôs official channels is your best strategy to navigate this period smoothly and ensure your Polkadot holdings are managed effectively. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why is Upbit suspending Polkadot (DOT) deposits and withdrawals? A1: Upbit is temporarily suspending DOT deposits and withdrawals due to an upcoming Polkadot network transition, which requires the exchange to update its systems for compatibility and security. Q2: When will the Upbit DOT suspension begin? A2: The suspension for Polkadot (DOT) deposits and withdrawals will commence at 3:00 a.m. UTC on November 4th. Q3: What should I do if I need to move my DOT during the suspension? A3: It is crucial to complete any necessary DOT deposits or withdrawals before the 3:00 a.m. UTC deadline on November 4th. During the suspension, you will not be able to move your DOT on or off Upbit. Q4: How long will the Upbit DOT suspension last? A4: The suspension is temporary, and its duration will depend on the completion and successful verification of the Polkadot network transition. Upbit will issue a separate announcement once services are restored. Q5: Will my DOT funds on Upbit be safe during the suspension? A5: Yes, your DOT funds held on Upbit remain secure during the suspension. The halt is for transaction processing, not for the security of your stored assets. Q6: Where can I find official updates regarding the Upbit DOT suspension? A6: Always refer to Upbit‚Äôs official website, announcements page, or their verified social media channels for the most accurate and up-to-date information regarding the suspension and its resumption. Did you find this information helpful? Share this article with fellow Polkadot holders and crypto enthusiasts to keep them informed about the urgent Upbit DOT suspension. Your sharing helps the community stay updated! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Polkadot price action. This post Urgent Alert: Upbit DOT Suspension Announced for Polkadot Network Transition first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Coinbase pushes back on fears that stablecoins undermine US banks
body: Coinbase has pushed back against warnings from major US banking groups that the rise of stablecoins could prove harmful to the country‚Äôs financial system. The exchange claims that fears that dollar-pegged tokens may leverage deposits from conventional banks are ‚Äúbaseless and deceptive. According to them, these tokens have important real-world applications that should not be overlooked. This was after Coinbase‚Äôs policy chief, Faryar Shirzad , mentioned that the concept that stablecoins will destroy bank lending is inaccurate. ‚ÄúMost of the demand for stablecoins comes from outside the US, which helps increase the global influence of the dollar rather than competing with your local bank,‚Äù Shirzad added. Coinbase defends stablecoins as payment tools In a recent blog post titled ‚ÄúRejecting the Banks‚Äô Deposit Erosion Myth‚Äù, Faryar Shirzad recently argued quite simply that stablecoins are mostly utilized for payments and international transfers ‚Äî not substitutes for your savings or checking account. According to Shirzad, ‚ÄúThe central claim that stablecoins will cause a mass outflow of bank deposits simply doesn‚Äôt hold up. These assets complement the banking system by improving payments, not competing with it.‚Äù Earlier, Shirzad provided a market note highlighting that discussions regarding how stablecoins influence bank deposits and loans echo similar concerns from initially existing innovations, such as money market funds. However, the note did explore the use of stablecoins. This situation arose from US banking groups‚Äô previous claims that stablecoins offering returns could rival bank accounts, leading to funds leaving banks. Therefore, they have urged Congress to set up limitations on services that provide returns on stablecoins. When reporters asked Coinbase about the sources of interest in the stablecoin ecosystem, the exchange stated in its note that most of the gains in stablecoins come from users in other countries seeking access to dollars, rather than US consumers. Coinbase also highlighted the importance of the US dollar stablecoins in emerging markets . According to a crypto exchange, individuals in these markets prefer using dollar stablecoins to protect themselves against the loss of value in their local currencies. This demonstrates that the crypto community views these tokens as a useful means of allowing underbanked individuals access to dollars. To date, approximately two-thirds of stablecoin transfers have taken place on decentralized finance or blockchain platforms. With these transfers, the digital token solidifies its position as the transaction backbone for a newly developed financial system that operates alongside, but mostly independently of, the domestic banking system, Coinbase said. Therefore, according to the crypto exchange, considering stablecoins as a threat misinterprets the situation. Shirzad backed Coinbase‚Äôs claim, explaining that tokens improved the dollar‚Äôs position globally and established a competitive edge that the US should not restrict. Coinbase also addresses concerns that community banks face regarding the widespread use of stablecoins , stating that the claims are unfounded. This suggests that the average Stablecoin user differs from the typical community bank customer. The GENIUS Act sparks investor confidence in stablecoins Shirzad noted that Community banks and users of stablecoin rarely overlap, suggesting that banks could improve their services using stablecoins. Coinbase, on the other hand, pointed out that the forecast of trillions of dollars moving into stablecoins in the next decade requires scrutiny. ‚ÄúEven if global stablecoin circulation reached $5 trillion, most of that value would still be held overseas or tied up in digital settlement systems, rather than being taken from US checking or savings accounts,‚Äù it explained. According to Coinbase, there are more than $18 trillion of commercial bank deposits in the US, and it contended that the impact of stablecoins on these deposits would remain limited. At the same time, the global influence of the US dollar would increase significantly. Some major banks and important financial institutions have already launched stablecoin services, while others plan to explore them after the US implemented the GENIUS Act early this year. This law governs the operation of stablecoin service providers in the country. Join a premium crypto trading community free for 30 days - normally $100/mo.

title: Binance Founder Zhao Changpeng's BNB Statement: "I Never Sold BNB!" Here Are the Details
body: Binance founder and former CEO Zhao Changpeng (CZ) stated in a statement on social media platform X that he never sold his BNB assets. Binance Founder Zhao Changpeng: ‚ÄúI Never Sold BNB‚Äù ‚ÄúI never sold BNB; I only used it for spending,‚Äù Zhao said in his post. ‚ÄúAlso, I bought all my BNB with my own money in the early stages of the project; it wasn't given to me for free.‚Äù This statement is a direct response to long-standing speculation surrounding Zhao's personal wealth and influence over BNB. As the core token of the Binance ecosystem, BNB is designed to provide discounts on transaction fees and be used in a variety of products. Zhao's statement, ‚ÄúI never sold,‚Äù specifically denies the ‚Äúinsider selling‚Äù allegations frequently circulating in the market. The former Binance executive has similarly emphasized his long-term confidence in BNB in the past, describing the token's role in the ecosystem as ‚Äúthe backbone of Binance.‚Äù Zhao's statement comes amid a recent and steady rise in the BNB price. Experts believe CZ's clear message could boost investor confidence and strengthen positive sentiment toward the BNB ecosystem. *This is not investment advice. title: Indonesia Stablecoin: A Pivotal Move Towards a Digital Rupiah Future
body: BitcoinWorld Indonesia Stablecoin: A Pivotal Move Towards a Digital Rupiah Future Exciting developments are on the horizon for Indonesia‚Äôs financial sector! The nation‚Äôs central bank, Bank Indonesia, is actively planning to introduce its very own Indonesia stablecoin . This groundbreaking initiative aims to transform how transactions are conducted and how monetary policy operates within the archipelago. Imagine a digital currency that offers the stability of the traditional rupiah but with the efficiency of modern blockchain technology. What Exactly is Indonesia‚Äôs Stablecoin Plan? Bank Indonesia‚Äôs ambitious project involves issuing a stablecoin directly tied to the country‚Äôs central bank digital currency (CBDC), which is known as the digital rupiah. What makes this particular stablecoin unique is its backing. Unlike many privately issued stablecoins, this official version will be backed by government bonds. This backing is crucial as it provides a strong foundation of trust and stability, ensuring that the digital rupiah maintains its value consistently. The move signifies a clear intent by Indonesia to embrace the future of finance while maintaining sovereign control over its monetary system. This official backing by government bonds is a key differentiator, aiming to instill confidence among users and integrate seamlessly into the existing financial infrastructure. Why is Indonesia Embracing a Stablecoin? The decision to launch an Indonesia stablecoin isn‚Äôt just about technological advancement; it‚Äôs about addressing several strategic national objectives. Here are some compelling reasons: Enhanced Financial Inclusion: A digital rupiah can reach remote areas more easily, bringing banking services to unbanked populations. Efficient Payment Systems: Digital transactions are typically faster and cheaper, reducing friction in domestic and potentially international payments. Monetary Policy Control: A CBDC offers the central bank greater oversight and direct control over the money supply and circulation, potentially improving the effectiveness of monetary policy. Combating Illicit Activities: A transparent, traceable digital currency can help in monitoring and preventing financial crimes. Promoting Innovation: It provides a secure, regulated platform for new financial products and services to emerge. By leveraging a stablecoin, Indonesia aims to modernize its financial ecosystem, making it more robust and accessible for all citizens. What Challenges Might Indonesia‚Äôs Stablecoin Face? While the prospect of an Indonesia stablecoin is promising, its implementation will not be without hurdles. Central banks globally are grappling with similar challenges when developing CBDCs. Key areas of concern include: Technological Adoption: Ensuring widespread access and understanding, especially among less tech-savvy populations, will be critical. Cybersecurity Risks: Protecting the digital infrastructure from hacks and data breaches is paramount to maintaining public trust. Privacy Concerns: Balancing transaction transparency with individual privacy rights will require careful policy formulation. Interoperability: Ensuring the digital rupiah can work smoothly with existing payment systems and potentially other national CBDCs. Public Acceptance: Gaining the trust and buy-in from both businesses and the general public will be a long-term effort. Addressing these challenges proactively will be essential for the successful rollout and adoption of Indonesia‚Äôs digital currency. How Does This Compare to Other Global CBDC Initiatives? Indonesia is joining a growing list of nations exploring or implementing CBDCs. For example, China has been a frontrunner with its digital yuan, undergoing extensive pilot programs. The European Central Bank is also deeply involved in exploring a digital euro. However, Indonesia‚Äôs approach with its stablecoin stands out due to its explicit backing by government bonds from the outset, providing a unique layer of sovereign assurance. This distinct backing mechanism aims to differentiate the digital rupiah from other digital assets, offering a blend of innovation and traditional financial stability. It signals a cautious yet progressive approach to integrating digital currencies into a national economy. What Does This Mean for the Future of Finance in Indonesia? The introduction of the Indonesia stablecoin is poised to be a game-changer for the nation‚Äôs financial landscape. It could pave the way for a more digitized economy, where transactions are seamless, secure, and inclusive. For businesses, it might mean lower transaction costs and faster settlements. For individuals, easier access to financial services and more efficient payments. This initiative positions Indonesia as a leader in digital currency innovation within Southeast Asia. It reflects a forward-thinking strategy to harness the power of digital assets while mitigating the volatility often associated with other cryptocurrencies. The long-term impact could be profound, fostering economic growth and greater financial resilience. In conclusion, Bank Indonesia‚Äôs plan to issue its own stablecoin, backed by government bonds and based on the digital rupiah, marks a significant milestone. This strategic move aims to enhance financial inclusion, streamline payment systems, and reinforce monetary policy control. While challenges exist, the potential benefits for Indonesia‚Äôs economy and its citizens are immense, heralding a new era of digital finance for the nation. Frequently Asked Questions About Indonesia‚Äôs Stablecoin Q: What is Indonesia‚Äôs stablecoin backed by? A: Indonesia‚Äôs stablecoin, the digital rupiah, will be uniquely backed by government bonds, providing a strong foundation of trust and stability. Q: How will the Indonesia stablecoin benefit ordinary citizens? A: It aims to enhance financial inclusion by providing easier access to banking services, especially in remote areas, and will facilitate faster and cheaper digital payments. Q: Is Indonesia‚Äôs stablecoin a cryptocurrency like Bitcoin? A: While it uses blockchain technology, it differs significantly from decentralized cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. As a stablecoin, its value is pegged to the Indonesian Rupiah and backed by government assets, ensuring price stability. Q: When is Indonesia‚Äôs stablecoin expected to launch? A: While Bank Indonesia has announced its plans, specific launch dates for the digital rupiah and its stablecoin are still under development and will be communicated as the project progresses. Q: How will the central bank maintain control over the digital rupiah? A: As a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC), the digital rupiah will give Bank Indonesia direct oversight and control over its issuance and circulation, allowing for more effective monetary policy management. Did you find this insight into Indonesia‚Äôs groundbreaking stablecoin initiative valuable? Share this article with your network and join the conversation about the future of digital finance in Southeast Asia! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital currencies institutional adoption. This post Indonesia Stablecoin: A Pivotal Move Towards a Digital Rupiah Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Spot Volume: October‚Äôs Astonishing Surge to Yearly Highs
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Spot Volume: October‚Äôs Astonishing Surge to Yearly Highs The cryptocurrency world is currently buzzing with significant news that demands attention: Bitcoin spot volume in October reached an astonishing yearly high, soaring past $300 billion. This remarkable surge wasn‚Äôt just a random spike; it signals a pivotal shift in trader behavior, moving away from the often perilous path of leveraged positions towards a more stable and organic market. What exactly prompted this dramatic change, and what profound implications does it hold for the future of Bitcoin trading? What Triggered the Massive Shift in Bitcoin Spot Volume ? The primary catalyst for this significant shift was a series of record-breaking liquidation events that profoundly shook the market on October 11th. For a vast number of traders, these forced liquidations served as a stark and painful reminder of the inherent dangers and unsustainability associated with highly leveraged positions within the notoriously volatile crypto landscape. Understanding Liquidations: In simple terms, liquidations occur when a trader‚Äôs collateral falls below a specific threshold, compelling their exchange to automatically close their positions to prevent further, catastrophic losses. It is, in essence, the market delivering a powerful message about excessive risk. The Market‚Äôs Wake-Up Call: The sheer scale and velocity of October‚Äôs liquidations prompted a widespread and urgent re-evaluation of risk management strategies among market participants. Many recognized the critical need to adapt their approach. Crypto analyst Darkfost, in a detailed contribution to CryptoQuant, eloquently highlighted that this unprecedented event underscored the fundamental unsustainability of relying on excessive leverage. While derivatives undoubtedly offer the alluring potential for amplified gains, they simultaneously carry the burdensome weight of magnified risks, a lesson many learned firsthand. Why a Spot-Driven Market Signals a Healthier Horizon for Bitcoin ? Following the dramatic liquidation cascade, a clear trend emerged: traders increasingly gravitated towards the spot market. This strategic move is not merely about avoiding immediate losses; it profoundly reflects a broader, evolving understanding of what truly constitutes a healthier and more sustainable market environment. A market predominantly driven by genuine Bitcoin spot volume transactions offers several distinct and compelling advantages: Significantly Reduced Volatility: Unlike derivatives markets, which are prone to experiencing extreme and rapid price swings due to large open interest and cascading liquidations, spot markets tend to be far less susceptible to such exaggerated movements. They reflect actual supply and demand. Reflection of Organic Demand: Spot trading inherently reflects genuine buying and selling interest, providing a more accurate indicator of actual demand for the underlying asset. This stands in stark contrast to leveraged trading, where positions can be opened without the immediate capital to back the full value of the trade. Enhanced Market Stability: Darkfost further emphasized that a market less vulnerable to the increased volatility caused by surges in open interest is inherently more stable. This newfound stability fosters greater confidence among participants and possesses the potential to attract a wider, more diverse range of investors, including crucial institutional players. The sustained increase in Bitcoin spot volume suggests a maturing market where participants are beginning to prioritize long-term sustainability and steady growth over short-term, high-risk gambles. This evolution is a positive sign for Bitcoin‚Äôs future trajectory. How Can You Adapt Your Crypto Strategy to This New Bitcoin Spot Volume Trend? The observed shift towards higher Bitcoin spot volume offers crucial, actionable insights for both nascent and seasoned traders alike. It powerfully highlights the paramount importance of prudent risk management and a comprehensive understanding of evolving market dynamics that extend far beyond simple price charts. Prioritize Robust Risk Management: Take the lessons from the October liquidations to heart. Diligently assess your personal risk tolerance and steadfastly avoid the temptation of over-leveraging, especially when dealing with inherently volatile assets such as Bitcoin. Thoughtfully Embrace Spot Trading: Consider strategically increasing your allocation to spot positions if your primary goal is greater stability and a reduced exposure to sudden, unpredictable market shocks. Spot positions require full collateral, mitigating liquidation risks. Focus on Fundamental Strength: A market increasingly driven by organic demand is inherently more likely to respond positively to fundamental developments. Therefore, remain diligently informed about Bitcoin‚Äôs underlying technological advancements, its growing adoption rates, and broader macroeconomic factors that influence its value. This overarching trend signifies a potential, profound evolution in how market participants approach Bitcoin, favoring a more grounded, analytical, and ultimately sustainable trading methodology. It strongly suggests that the market is actively learning to self-correct, steadily moving towards a more balanced and resilient equilibrium. October‚Äôs impressive surge in Bitcoin spot volume is far more than just a mere statistical anomaly; it represents a powerful narrative of resilience, adaptation, and growing maturity within the dynamic crypto market. Following a harsh, albeit necessary, lesson from massive liquidations, traders are now consciously opting for stability and organic growth, effectively paving the way for a potentially healthier, more predictable, and robust ecosystem. This significant shift underscores a collective move towards sustainable trading practices, signaling a truly promising future for Bitcoin and the broader cryptocurrency landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What exactly is Bitcoin spot volume? A1: Bitcoin spot volume refers to the total value of Bitcoin traded on the spot market, where transactions are settled immediately at the current market price. It represents direct buying and selling of the actual asset, rather than contracts or derivatives. Q2: Why did Bitcoin spot volume reach a yearly high in October? A2: The surge in October‚Äôs Bitcoin spot volume was primarily driven by traders shifting away from leveraged positions. This followed a massive liquidation event on October 11th, which reminded participants of the risks associated with derivatives, prompting a move towards more stable spot trading. Q3: What are liquidations in cryptocurrency trading? A3: Liquidations occur when a trader‚Äôs leveraged position is automatically closed by an exchange due to insufficient collateral to cover potential losses. This typically happens during periods of high volatility when the market moves sharply against a trader‚Äôs bet. Q4: How does a spot-driven market benefit Bitcoin? A4: A market driven by higher Bitcoin spot volume is considered healthier and more stable. It leads to reduced volatility, reflects more organic demand for Bitcoin, and is less susceptible to the exaggerated price swings often seen in derivatives markets, fostering greater confidence. Q5: How can traders adapt to this trend of increased spot trading? A5: Traders can adapt by prioritizing robust risk management, considering increasing their allocation to spot positions for stability, and focusing on Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamental strengths. This shift emphasizes sustainable trading over high-risk leveraged gambles. Did you find this analysis of October‚Äôs Bitcoin spot volume insightful? Share this article with your network on social media to help more traders understand the evolving dynamics of the crypto market and make informed decisions! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Bitcoin Spot Volume: October‚Äôs Astonishing Surge to Yearly Highs first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: MMT Tokenomics: Unlocking Momentum‚Äôs Strategic Multi-Layer Revenue Power
body: BitcoinWorld MMT Tokenomics: Unlocking Momentum‚Äôs Strategic Multi-Layer Revenue Power In the dynamic world of decentralized finance (DeFi), understanding a project‚Äôs true value often goes beyond simple metrics like Total Value Locked (TVL). Momentum (MMT), a rising force in the crypto space, offers a compelling case study in this regard. Its innovative MMT tokenomics are intricately designed to reflect a sophisticated multi-layer architecture and a robust revenue generation pipeline, promising a sustainable and engaging ecosystem for its users. Understanding Momentum‚Äôs Strategic MMT Tokenomics Momentum‚Äôs approach to value creation is refreshingly transparent. As Nick Lee, Marketing Head at Momentum (MMT), recently highlighted during a Bitcoin World Night Live (CNL) AMA session, the project‚Äôs worth is not solely dependent on its TVL. Instead, it‚Äôs deeply embedded in its unique structure. The project features a distinct multi-layer architecture, which is essentially a framework designed to handle various functions and interactions within the platform efficiently. This architecture, coupled with a clear revenue structure pipeline, forms the very foundation of MMT tokenomics . This means that every aspect of the token‚Äôs design is geared towards supporting and benefiting from these underlying systems. It‚Äôs a holistic view where the token isn‚Äôt just a digital asset; it‚Äôs a key operational component. The Power of veMMT: Your Voice in the Ecosystem One of the most exciting features of Momentum‚Äôs ecosystem is the concept of veMMT. Users who choose to lock up their MMT tokens on the platform receive veMMT in return. This isn‚Äôt just a fancy name; it represents tangible power and influence within the Momentum community. Here‚Äôs what veMMT empowers you to do: Voting Rights: Holders of veMMT gain crucial voting rights, allowing them to participate directly in the governance of the platform. Liquidity Pool Selection: These voting rights enable users to select which liquidity pools will receive MMT reward distributions. This direct influence helps steer the growth and incentivize participation in preferred areas of the ecosystem. Earn Swap Fees: Beyond governance, veMMT holders also have the opportunity to earn a share of the swap fees generated from these chosen liquidity pools. This creates a direct incentive for active participation and long-term commitment. This mechanism ensures that active community members are not only rewarded but also play a vital role in shaping the platform‚Äôs future. It fosters a truly decentralized and community-driven environment. Benchmarking MMT Tokenomics: A Vision for Impressive Growth When assessing the potential of a new crypto project, a clear valuation strategy is essential. The Momentum team demonstrated its commitment to transparency and strategic planning by establishing a Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) target. This target, set between $250 million and $350 million, wasn‚Äôt pulled out of thin air. Instead, it was meticulously benchmarked against similar ve(3,3)-based protocols. For those unfamiliar, ‚Äúve(3,3)‚Äù refers to a tokenomics model that combines vote-escrowed (ve) tokens with the (3,3) game theory mechanism, often seen in projects like Curve Finance. This model encourages long-term staking and active governance, aligning user incentives with the protocol‚Äôs success. By comparing itself to established projects utilizing this robust model, Momentum provides a credible outlook for its future growth potential, directly tied to its sophisticated MMT tokenomics . This strategic valuation indicates a clear understanding of the market and a strong belief in the project‚Äôs foundational design. Why Biddle Pad? Security, Fairness, and Trust for MMT The choice of a community platform for a token launch is a critical decision, impacting security, user experience, and overall trust. Momentum meticulously selected Biddle Pad as the community platform for the MMT token. This decision was driven by Biddle Pad‚Äôs established reputation for: Security: Protecting user assets and data is paramount in the crypto space. Biddle Pad offers robust security measures to safeguard participants. Fairness: Ensuring an equitable distribution and participation process is crucial for community engagement and trust. Biddle Pad‚Äôs mechanisms promote fairness. User Trust: A platform that has earned the trust of its user base instills confidence in new projects launching on it. Biddle Pad‚Äôs track record in this regard was a key factor. This careful selection underscores Momentum‚Äôs dedication to providing a secure and trustworthy environment for its community members, reflecting the project‚Äôs broader commitment to integrity. Unlocking Momentum‚Äôs Potential: Key Takeaways Momentum (MMT) is clearly positioning itself as a project that understands the nuances of sustainable growth in DeFi. It moves beyond superficial metrics to focus on a deeply integrated system where its MMT tokenomics are a direct reflection of its operational strength. Key benefits for users include: Active governance through veMMT. Opportunities to earn swap fees. A transparent and strategically benchmarked valuation. A secure and fair platform for token distribution. By emphasizing its multi-layer architecture and revenue pipeline, Momentum offers a compelling vision for long-term value creation. This thoughtful design ensures that the MMT token is not just a speculative asset but a functional cornerstone of a growing ecosystem, offering a powerful proposition for those looking for genuine utility and community involvement in their crypto investments. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Momentum (MMT)? A1: Momentum (MMT) is a decentralized finance (DeFi) project that features a multi-layer architecture and a structured revenue pipeline, with its value and operations deeply reflected in its unique tokenomics. Q2: How do MMT tokenomics work? A2: MMT tokenomics are designed to align with the project‚Äôs multi-layer architecture and revenue structure. They enable users to lock MMT for veMMT, granting voting rights and the ability to earn swap fees, thus linking token utility directly to platform functionality and growth. Q3: What is veMMT and what are its benefits? A3: veMMT is obtained by locking MMT tokens on the platform. It grants holders voting rights to select liquidity pools for MMT reward distribution and allows them to earn a share of the swap fees generated from those pools. This empowers users with governance and passive income opportunities. Q4: How was Momentum‚Äôs FDV determined? A4: Momentum‚Äôs Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) was established between $250 million and $350 million by benchmarking against similar ve(3,3)-based protocols. This strategic comparison accounts for the project‚Äôs current standing and future growth potential. Q5: Why was Biddle Pad chosen as the community platform for MMT? A5: Biddle Pad was selected due to its strong reputation for security, fairness, and user trust. This ensures a reliable and equitable environment for the MMT token‚Äôs community and distribution. title: KRWQ becomes first Korean Won stablecoin on Coinbase‚Äôs Base network
body: IQ, in collaboration with decentralized finance protocol Frax, has launched a stablecoin pegged to the South Korean won (KRW) named KRWQ. The token is the first won-denominated stablecoin on Coinbase‚Äôs Ethereum Layer 2 network, Base. Published on Thursday in a joint news release, KRWQ is the first Korean won-backed multichain stablecoin that leverages the Stargate bridge and LayerZero‚Äôs Omnichain Fungible Token (OFT) standard to facilitate transfers between several blockchains. The inaugural trading pair for the coin was KRWQ/USDC on the decentralized exchange Aerodrome. IQ said it collaborated with Frax to incorporate compliance and institutional safeguards modeled on Frax‚Äôs frxUSD system to draw institutional interest. ‚ÄúWhile USD-backed stablecoins dominate today, no credible won-denominated stablecoin has ever launched at scale. KRWQ fills a critical gap in the market,‚Äù said Chief Brain of IQ Navin Vethanayagam. The launch comes in a week after Japan introduced a fully globally tradable and redeemable digital yen backed by domestic deposits and Japanese government bonds (JGBs), Cryptopolitan reported . Won stablecoin yet to be offered to South Koreans KRWQ is available on Base and other supported blockchains, but it is not yet marketed or offered to South Korean residents since there is no regulatory law governing the assets locally. IQ and Frax said minting and redemption are currently limited to eligible counterparties such as exchanges, market makers, and institutional partners. ‚ÄúKRWQ is designed to be the first fully regulatory-compliant stablecoin in Korea, developed in anticipation of forthcoming legislation currently under review in the National Assembly,‚Äù IQ noted in its announcement. Last month, South Korean digital asset custody provider BDACS launched KRW1, another won-pegged stablecoin launched on Avalanche. However, BDACS coined KRW1 a ‚Äúproof-of-concept‚Äù due to unclear regulatory guidance in the country. Since the election of President Lee Jae Myung in June, South Korea has expedited its plans to build a local currency-pegged stablecoin market. The initiative is part of a broader strategy to strengthen the country‚Äôs monetary sovereignty in tandem with upcoming laws to add stablecoins to its digital economy. Korea‚Äôs stablecoin legislation not established South Korea is preparing to introduce its first law covering stablecoins under the Foreign Exchange Transactions Act. According to National Assembly officials, the proposed amendment could classify stablecoins as legal ‚Äúmeans of payment,‚Äù placing them in the same category as government-issued notes and bank currency. Representative Park Sung-hoon of the main opposition People Power Party, who proposed the bill, said stablecoins are outside existing legal definitions despite their popularity in the Asian jurisdiction. Financial Supervisory Service (FSS) data shows coin flows between Huione Guarantee, a virtual asset platform linked to Cambodia-based Huione Group, and five South Korean exchanges, including Upbit and Bithumb, reached 12.8 billion won ($8.9 million) last year. The tally is a 1,400-fold increase from 9.22 million won in 2023, with 99.9% of transactions conducted using US dollar pegged stablecoin Tether (USDT). South Korean authorities have stalled passing laws because they have mostly been worried about the use of stablecoins in illicit financial activities. The US and UK governments sanctioned Huione Group for alleged fraud and laundering of stolen funds, with Huione Guarantee now designated as a high-risk platform for fund transfers. US dollar dominance breeds need for other fiat-backed digital currencies America‚Äôs foothold in the stablecoin market has reportedly made it urgent for the South Korean government‚Äôs legislative response, alongside other countries like Japan. As reported by the Korean Times last week, Financial Services Commission (FSC) Chairman Lee Eog-weon said the forthcoming bill on stablecoins is in its final stages of coordination with relevant ministries. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino said in a recent interview with the local news publication that only a few countries are well-positioned to issue national stablecoins at scale, including Korea. ‚ÄúI think the Korean won is going to be one of the most important currencies for settling transactions and tech-related commodity trades, as well as international agreements for access to new technology,‚Äù he surmised. Don‚Äôt just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .
