title: Mastercard Nears $2 Billion Deal to Acquire Zerohash
body: Payments giant Mastercard is reportedly in the final stages of negotiations to acquire crypto company Zerohash, Fortune reports, citing five sources familiar with the potential deal. Zerohash is an American startup that provides infrastructure for stablecoins and other digital assets. The deal could reach about $2 billion, though completion is not yet guaranteed, according to the statement. What Zerohash Does & Why It Matters Zerohash is a leading B2B crypto and stablecoin infrastructure provider. It enables banks, brokerages, fintechs and payment firms to build crypto and digital-asset services without having to build the entire backend themselves. Key capabilities of Zerohash include: API-first, modular infrastructure that supports trading, custody, deposits/withdrawals, tokenization, payments and on/off-ramps. Wide regulatory footprint: In the U.S., Zerohash is a FinCEN-registered Money Service Business and regulated Money Transmitter across jurisdictions. European, Australian and other affiliates operate as Virtual Asset Service Providers (VASP) in their markets. Support for stablecoins and various blockchains: For example, Zerohash recently announced support for the DOT token and the Polkadot ecosystem for deposits and withdrawals. Strong growth and funding: The company recently raised around $100 million and is approaching a valuation near $1 billion, underscoring enterprise interest in crypto infrastructure. In short: Zerohash acts as the ‚Äúbehind-the-scenes‚Äù engine that allows traditional financial and fintech firms to integrate crypto and stablecoin capabilities rapidly and compliantly. Strategic Implications For Mastercard Zerohash‚Äôs infrastructure aligns well with Mastercard‚Äôs broader strategy to treat cryptocurrencies and stablecoins not purely as speculative assets but as payment technologies. Mastercard has publicly stated that it sees crypto primarily as a means to speed up payments and improve efficiency, rather than as a purely revolutionary phenomenon. By acquiring Zerohash, Mastercard would gain: Ready-built infrastructure to offer stablecoin rails, trading, custody and other digital-asset services through its existing network. Access to enterprise clients already using Zerohash (banks, brokerages, payment providers) ‚Äî which could accelerate Mastercard‚Äôs entry into crypto-enabled payments. A stronger position in the race among traditional financial firms to integrate digital assets, giving it a competitive edge over peers. This move also follows Mastercard‚Äôs earlier discussions to acquire another crypto startup, BVNK, which likewise focused on stablecoins. Those talks reached an advanced stage, though they ultimately shifted to exclusivity with Coinbase.

title: Aster Price Prediction: Unveiling the Future Potential of ASTR Crypto
body: BitcoinWorld Aster Price Prediction: Unveiling the Future Potential of ASTR Crypto Are you looking to navigate the complex world of digital assets and wondering about the future trajectory of specific cryptocurrencies? Today, we delve deep into Aster Price Prediction for the coming years, a topic of significant interest for many investors. The cryptocurrency market is dynamic, often presenting both exciting opportunities and considerable risks. Understanding the potential path of an asset like ASTR crypto requires a blend of technical analysis, fundamental understanding of its ecosystem, and a keen eye on broader market trends. If you‚Äôre considering adding ASTR to your portfolio, this comprehensive guide will help you weigh the pros and cons, offering insights into its potential growth and the factors that could influence its value from 2025 through 2030. Understanding the Aster Network: A Foundation for ASTR Crypto Before we project future prices, it‚Äôs crucial to understand what the Aster Network is and why it matters in the blockchain space. Aster, officially known as Astar Network, is a decentralized application (dApp) hub on Polkadot that supports EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) and WebAssembly (Wasm) smart contracts. Its primary goal is to provide a scalable, interoperable, and developer-friendly platform for building decentralized applications. This unique position within the Polkadot ecosystem allows developers to leverage the security and interoperability of Polkadot while deploying dApps that can interact with various blockchain environments. The network distinguishes itself through several key features: Multi-Chain Compatibility: Astar Network supports multiple virtual machines, making it attractive for developers from different blockchain backgrounds. This means dApps built on Astar can be easily migrated or integrated with other chains. dApp Staking: A pioneering mechanism that allows users to stake their ASTR tokens on dApps. In return, both the dApp developers and the stakers receive rewards, creating a sustainable incentive model for growth and innovation within the ecosystem. Layer 2 Solutions: Astar is designed to be a hub for future Layer 2 scaling solutions, aiming to address the scalability challenges inherent in many blockchain networks. Interoperability: As a Polkadot parachain, Astar benefits from Polkadot‚Äôs shared security and cross-chain communication capabilities, enhancing its potential for seamless interaction with other parachains and external networks. This robust infrastructure forms the bedrock of the ASTR crypto ‚Äòs value proposition. A network that fosters innovation and developer activity naturally creates demand for its native token, influencing its long-term price trajectory. ASTR Token Price: The Engine of the Ecosystem The ASTR Token Price is directly tied to its utility within the Astar Network. ASTR is not just a speculative asset; it‚Äôs an integral part of the network‚Äôs operations and governance. Understanding its tokenomics and utility is essential for any informed Crypto Investment decision. The ASTR token serves multiple vital functions: Transaction Fees: ASTR is used to pay for transaction fees on the Astar Network, similar to how ETH is used on Ethereum. This creates a constant demand for the token as network activity grows. dApp Staking Rewards: As mentioned, users stake ASTR to support dApps and earn rewards. This mechanism encourages long-term holding and participation, reducing the circulating supply available on exchanges. Network Governance: ASTR holders have the power to participate in the network‚Äôs decentralized governance. They can propose and vote on crucial decisions, such as protocol upgrades, parameter changes, and treasury allocations. This empowers the community and aligns incentives for the network‚Äôs future success. Collateral for Parachain Auctions: While Astar is already a parachain, ASTR can also be used in future Polkadot parachain auctions or similar initiatives within the broader ecosystem, creating additional utility. The total supply of ASTR is designed with a specific inflation model to incentivize network participants and secure the network. As the network matures and adoption increases, the demand for these utilities is expected to rise, potentially influencing the ASTR Token Price positively. However, it‚Äôs important to monitor the inflation rate and how it balances with demand to make accurate predictions. Decoding Aster Price Prediction: Factors at Play Predicting cryptocurrency prices is a complex endeavor, influenced by a myriad of factors. For a comprehensive Aster Price Prediction , we must consider both internal network developments and external market forces. Here are some of the most significant factors: 1. Broader Cryptocurrency Market Trends The price of ASTR, like most altcoins, is often correlated with the performance of Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). A bull run in the broader crypto market typically lifts altcoins, while a bear market can lead to widespread price declines. Macroeconomic factors such as inflation, interest rates, and global economic stability also play a role, influencing investor sentiment and risk appetite. 2. Astar Network Development and Adoption The continuous development of the Astar Network, including protocol upgrades, new features, and successful integrations, is paramount. Increased developer activity, the launch of innovative dApps, and a growing user base directly contribute to the network‚Äôs utility and, by extension, the demand for ASTR crypto . Partnerships with established companies or other blockchain projects can also provide significant boosts. 3. Competition and Innovation The blockchain space is highly competitive. Astar Network faces competition from other Layer 1 and Layer 2 solutions aiming to be dApp hubs. Its ability to innovate, maintain a strong developer community, and offer unique value propositions will be critical for its long-term success and price appreciation. Keeping an eye on competitors and Astar‚Äôs comparative advantages is key. 4. Regulatory Landscape Government regulations around cryptocurrencies can significantly impact market sentiment and investor confidence. Clear, supportive regulations can foster growth, while restrictive or uncertain regulations can hinder it. The evolving global regulatory environment for Web3 and decentralized finance (DeFi) will inevitably affect Astar. 5. Tokenomics and Supply Dynamics The supply schedule, staking mechanisms, and any potential token burns or emissions directly influence the circulating supply of ASTR. A well-managed tokenomics model that balances incentives with scarcity can contribute to a healthy price trajectory. High staking participation, for instance, reduces the immediate selling pressure on the market. ASTR Crypto‚Äôs Trajectory: Price Forecasts for 2025 Looking specifically at 2025, the trajectory for ASTR crypto will likely be shaped by the culmination of current market cycles and the ongoing development of the Astar Network. Many analysts believe that 2025 could see a continuation or resurgence of a bullish market, following a potential Bitcoin halving event in 2024. If this holds true, ASTR could experience significant upward momentum. Here‚Äôs what could influence ASTR in 2025: Post-Halving Bull Run: Historically, Bitcoin halvings have preceded significant bull markets. If this pattern repeats, altcoins like ASTR are likely to benefit from increased capital inflow into the crypto space. Polkadot Ecosystem Growth: As a key parachain, ASTR‚Äôs performance is closely tied to the overall health and growth of the Polkadot ecosystem. Increased adoption of Polkadot‚Äôs cross-chain capabilities and the launch of more parachains could create a positive ripple effect. Increased dApp Adoption: If the Astar Network successfully attracts more developers and sees a surge in the number of active dApps and users, the utility and demand for ASTR for transaction fees and dApp staking will naturally rise. Technological Milestones: Any significant technological upgrades, such as improved scaling solutions or new interoperability features, could act as strong catalysts for price appreciation. While exact figures are speculative, many predictions suggest a potential for ASTR to reclaim previous highs and even surpass them, provided market conditions are favorable and the network continues its robust development. Investors should keep an eye on these developments to make informed decisions about their Crypto Investment strategy. Long-Term Outlook: Aster Price Prediction 2026-2030 The long-term Aster Price Prediction from 2026 to 2030 requires a broader perspective, focusing on the fundamental strength of the Astar Network and its role in the evolving Web3 landscape. Over this period, the cryptocurrency market is expected to mature, with greater institutional adoption and clearer regulatory frameworks. Key considerations for the long-term: Web3 Adoption: Astar‚Äôs positioning as a dApp hub makes it a crucial player in the broader Web3 movement. As more industries and individuals transition to decentralized applications, Astar could see substantial growth. Interoperability Dominance: The future of blockchain is widely believed to be multi-chain and interoperable. Astar‚Äôs core design within Polkadot‚Äôs ecosystem gives it a strong advantage in this regard, facilitating seamless communication and asset transfer across different blockchains. Sustainable dApp Staking Model: The long-term success of dApp staking will be vital. If this model proves sustainable and continues to attract both developers and token holders, it will create a powerful flywheel effect for the network and its token. Ecosystem Expansion: The growth of Astar‚Äôs ecosystem, including its partnerships, grants programs, and community initiatives, will determine its longevity and relevance in a competitive market. Here‚Äôs a hypothetical long-term price prediction table, based on general market trends and Astar‚Äôs potential growth. Please remember these are highly speculative and subject to significant change. Year Minimum Price ($) Maximum Price ($) Average Price ($) 2026 0.25 0.60 0.40 2027 0.35 0.85 0.55 2028 0.50 1.20 0.75 2029 0.70 1.80 1.10 2030 1.00 2.50 1.60 These figures are illustrative and represent a potential growth trajectory assuming continued development, market stability, and increasing adoption of the Aster Network . Real-world results may vary wildly. Is ASTR a Wise Crypto Investment Strategy? The question of whether to buy Aster, or if ASTR represents a wise Crypto Investment strategy, is multifaceted. There‚Äôs no single answer that fits everyone, as it depends heavily on individual risk tolerance, investment horizon, and financial goals. However, we can analyze the potential benefits and challenges. Potential Benefits of Investing in ASTR: Strong Fundamentals: Astar Network addresses real-world challenges in blockchain scalability and interoperability, with a clear vision and a robust technical foundation. Polkadot Ecosystem Integration: Being a key parachain on Polkadot provides Astar with shared security and access to a growing ecosystem of interconnected blockchains. Innovative dApp Staking: This unique mechanism creates a powerful incentive for both developers and token holders, fostering a vibrant and sustainable ecosystem. Developer-Friendly Environment: Support for both EVM and Wasm attracts a wide range of developers, potentially leading to a diverse array of dApps. Growth Potential in Web3: As Web3 evolves, Astar is well-positioned to capitalize on the increasing demand for decentralized applications and services. Challenges and Risks: Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are inherently volatile. ASTR‚Äôs price can experience rapid and unpredictable swings, leading to potential losses. Competition: The dApp platform space is highly competitive, with many well-funded projects vying for developer and user attention. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for crypto could impact Astar‚Äôs operations and market perception. Technological Risks: While robust, any blockchain project carries inherent technological risks, including potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, or scaling limitations. Dependence on Polkadot: While beneficial, Astar‚Äôs strong ties to Polkadot also mean its fate is somewhat linked to the broader Polkadot ecosystem‚Äôs success. For those with a higher risk tolerance and a long-term perspective, ASTR could be an interesting addition to a diversified crypto portfolio. However, it is crucial to conduct your own thorough research and consider consulting a financial advisor before making any investment decisions. Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Where to Buy ASTR Token? If you‚Äôve decided that investing in ASTR aligns with your Crypto Investment strategy, you‚Äôll be pleased to know that the ASTR Token Price is available on several major cryptocurrency exchanges. These platforms provide liquidity and ease of access for purchasing the token. Some of the prominent exchanges where you can buy ASTR include: Binance: One of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges, offering a wide range of trading pairs and features. Coinbase: A popular choice for beginners due to its user-friendly interface and strong regulatory compliance in many regions. Kraken: Known for its robust security features and a good selection of altcoins. Gate.io: Another global exchange with a broad selection of cryptocurrencies. KuCoin: A popular exchange for altcoin trading, often listing newer projects. The process generally involves: Creating an Account: Register on your chosen exchange and complete the Know Your Customer (KYC) verification process. Funding Your Account: Deposit fiat currency (like USD, EUR) via bank transfer, credit/debit card, or transfer existing crypto. Purchasing ASTR: Navigate to the trading section, search for the ASTR trading pair (e.g., ASTR/USDT, ASTR/BTC), and place a buy order. Storing Your ASTR: For long-term holdings, consider transferring your ASTR from the exchange to a private wallet (hardware wallet like Ledger or Trezor, or a software wallet) for enhanced security. Always ensure you are using a reputable exchange and are aware of the associated fees for trading and withdrawals. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about ASTR Crypto What is Astar Network (ASTR)? Astar Network is a dApp hub on Polkadot that supports EVM and WebAssembly smart contracts. It aims to be a multi-chain smart contract platform, enabling developers to build dApps with scalability and interoperability. It‚Äôs a foundational layer for Web3, connecting various blockchain environments. Is ASTR a good investment? Whether ASTR is a ‚Äògood‚Äô investment depends on your personal financial goals and risk tolerance. It has strong fundamentals, innovative features like dApp staking, and a strategic position within the Polkadot ecosystem. However, it also carries the inherent volatility and risks associated with cryptocurrency investments. It‚Äôs crucial to do your own research and consult a financial advisor. What drives the ASTR Token Price? The ASTR Token Price is driven by its utility within the Astar Network, including transaction fees, dApp staking, and governance. Broader market trends, network adoption, technological developments, and the overall health of the Polkadot ecosystem also significantly influence its value. Who founded Astar Network? Astar Network was founded by Sota Watanabe . He is a prominent figure in the Japanese blockchain community and has been instrumental in leading the development and vision of the Astar Network. What is dApp Staking on Astar Network? dApp staking is a unique mechanism on the Astar Network where users can stake their ASTR tokens to support their favorite dApps. In return, both the dApp developers and the stakers receive rewards in ASTR, creating a mutually beneficial system that incentivizes development and community participation. Conclusion: Navigating the Future of ASTR Crypto Our journey through the Aster Price Prediction for 2025, 2026-2030 reveals a project with substantial potential rooted in strong technological fundamentals and a strategic position within the Polkadot ecosystem. The Aster Network ‚Äòs commitment to interoperability, scalability, and developer-friendliness positions it as a significant player in the evolving Web3 landscape. While the future of any cryptocurrency, including ASTR crypto , remains subject to market volatility and unforeseen developments, the innovative dApp staking mechanism and its utility as the native token for transaction fees and governance provide a compelling case for its long-term viability. For those considering a Crypto Investment in ASTR, thorough research, a clear understanding of the risks, and a long-term perspective are essential. The path ahead for ASTR is exciting, offering a blend of innovation and opportunity for those willing to navigate the digital frontier. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin, Ethereum, US Dollar, interest rates liquidity, institutional adoption. title: SpaceX Moves Massive Amounts of Bitcoin Again! Does Elon Musk Have a New Plan for Bitcoin? Here's the Possible Reason‚Ä¶
body: Activity continues on the front of Tesla CEO Elon Musk, who is known for his support of Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrencies, especially Dogecoin (DOGE). At this point, the address linked to Elon Musk's space exploration company SpaceX has moved BTC holdings for the third time in the last 10 days. According to a post by crypto analytics platform Lookonchain, SpaceX transferred 281 BTC worth $31.28 million to a new wallet a few hours ago. It is estimated that this transfer, like the other two, was probably for concealment purposes. At this point, Arkham Intelligence detected SpaceX‚Äôs large movement of 2,495 BTC (approximately $257 million) on October 21, 2025, and noted that this movement indicated an ongoing restructuring pattern on-chain. Related News: Elon Musk's SpaceX Makes Huge Bitcoin (BTC) Move After 3 Months of Break! What's Happening? While SpaceX's Bitcoin transfers are believed to be part of a restructuring, the high value and frequency of the transfers have led some to believe SpaceX may be preparing for broader strategy changes. Some users are speculating that these changes could be a sign of an upcoming major announcement or strategy shift. According to Arkham Intelligence data, SpaceX moved approximately $268.5 million worth of Bitcoin on October 21. This marked the first major transaction since July, and just three days later, another 1,215 Bitcoins worth approximately $133.7 million were transferred. According to Arkham Intelligence, SpaceX's Bitcoin wallet holds approximately $801 million worth of 7,258 BTC. SpaceX sold off approximately 70% of its Bitcoin holdings after the Terra-Luna crash and FTX bankruptcy that shook the cryptocurrency market in mid-2022. There is no evidence of any new purchases since then. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: SpaceX Moves Massive Amounts of Bitcoin Again! Does Elon Musk Have a New Plan for Bitcoin? Here's the Possible Reason‚Ä¶

title: Metalpha Investment: A Strategic $12M Boost for Digital Asset Expansion
body: BitcoinWorld Metalpha Investment: A Strategic $12M Boost for Digital Asset Expansion Exciting news is rippling through the digital asset world! Hong Kong-based digital asset manager Metalpha recently announced a significant Metalpha investment , securing an impressive $12 million in a private placement. This substantial capital injection is a clear vote of confidence in Metalpha‚Äôs vision and the burgeoning digital finance sector. The company plans to issue common shares to two prominent entities: Hong Kong family office Avenir and Gortune International Investment Limited. This strategic move is set to empower Metalpha to significantly expand its blockchain trading services and accelerate its business development initiatives. It‚Äôs a pivotal moment that underscores the growing institutional interest in the innovative space of digital assets. Who‚Äôs Behind This Pivotal Metalpha Investment? The backing from Avenir, a respected Hong Kong family office, and Gortune International Investment Limited is a testament to Metalpha‚Äôs strong market position and future potential. These investors are not just providing capital; they are bringing valuable experience and networks to the table. Their involvement signals a deeper integration of traditional finance players into the digital asset ecosystem. This kind of institutional support is crucial for the maturation and broader acceptance of blockchain-based financial services. The confidence shown by these entities in the Metalpha investment could inspire further institutional engagement in the sector. How Will the Metalpha Investment Fuel Expansion? Metalpha has a clear roadmap for utilizing these fresh funds. The $12 million is earmarked for two primary areas: enhancing blockchain trading services and driving robust business development. This focused approach aims to solidify Metalpha‚Äôs competitive edge. Here‚Äôs a closer look at what this Metalpha investment will enable: Expanding Blockchain Trading Services: Metalpha will likely invest in advanced trading infrastructure, sophisticated algorithms, and a wider range of digital asset offerings. This expansion aims to provide more efficient and diverse trading solutions for its clients. Accelerating Business Development: Funds will be allocated to explore new markets, forge strategic partnerships, and enhance client acquisition efforts. This includes strengthening its team and technological capabilities to meet growing demand. Ultimately, this strategic injection of capital is about scaling Metalpha‚Äôs operations and cementing its position as a leader in digital asset management. What Does This Metalpha Investment Mean for the Digital Asset Landscape? This significant funding round for Metalpha holds broader implications for the entire digital asset industry. It reinforces the narrative that institutional capital is increasingly flowing into well-managed and promising ventures within the blockchain space. Such investments validate the long-term potential of digital assets. Furthermore, Metalpha‚Äôs strengthened capacity to offer advanced blockchain trading services could drive innovation across the sector. It may encourage other firms to enhance their offerings, fostering a more competitive and sophisticated market. The success of this Metalpha investment could serve as a blueprint for future funding rounds in the industry. Navigating Growth: Opportunities Following the Metalpha Investment While the investment provides a significant boost, the digital asset market is dynamic and comes with its own set of opportunities and challenges. Metalpha‚Äôs strategic use of these funds will be key to navigating this evolving landscape effectively. The company is now better positioned to capitalize on emerging trends and regulatory shifts. The firm can now invest more heavily in compliance and security, which are paramount in the digital asset space. This enhanced financial footing allows Metalpha to not only expand but also to build a more resilient and trustworthy platform for its clients. The Metalpha investment equips the company for sustainable growth. In conclusion, the $12 million Metalpha investment marks a crucial milestone for the company and the broader digital asset industry. It empowers Metalpha to innovate, expand its services, and reinforce its position as a key player in digital asset management. This development signals continued confidence in the future of blockchain-based finance and sets a positive precedent for growth and institutional engagement. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Metalpha? Metalpha is a Hong Kong-based digital asset manager that provides a range of services related to digital assets, including blockchain trading services. Who are the investors in this $12 million private placement? The investment comes from Hong Kong family office Avenir and Gortune International Investment Limited. How will Metalpha use the $12 million investment? Metalpha plans to use the funds to expand its blockchain trading services and for overall business development initiatives. What does this Metalpha investment mean for the digital asset market? This investment signifies growing institutional confidence in the digital asset sector and Metalpha‚Äôs potential. It could lead to more sophisticated services and further innovation within the industry. Is this a common way for digital asset companies to raise funds? Yes, private placements are a common method for companies, including those in the digital asset space, to raise capital from specific investors to fund their growth and expansion plans. If you found this insight into Metalpha‚Äôs significant funding round valuable, consider sharing it with your network! Stay informed about the latest developments shaping the future of digital finance. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping digital asset management and institutional adoption . title: Russian brokerage Cifra Markets expects BTC uptrend to $130K to start in November
body: The price of Bitcoin is going to surpass $130,000 by the end of 2025, according to an estimate by a regulated cryptocurrency broker in Russia and the region. The country‚Äôs crypto market is among the world‚Äôs top three, says the head of Cifra Markets, who believes cryptocurrencies are becoming part of Russian finance. Bitcoin market uptrend to begin in November, broker says Bitcoin, the cryptocurrency with the largest market cap, which saw some major downturns lately, will soon return to growth and is likely to reach new all-time highs this year according to Alexey Korolenko, executive director of Cifra Markets, a licensed provider of crypto brokering services for investors in Russia and other members of the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS). In an interview with the TASS news agency, Korolenko argued that cryptocurrencies are no longer considered fringe assets in these countries, as regulation brings trust and recognition to the market. He also commented on the Bitcoin volatility , connecting it to statements coming out of Washington and other developments in the United States. Among them, U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs latest tariff threats to China led to a historical wave of liquidations earlier in October. These fueled pessimism among traders in a series of ‚Äúblack swan‚Äù events, the expert explained, elaborating: ‚ÄúThe cryptocurrency market remains volatile, still reacting to Trump‚Äôs statements and the introduction of new tariffs, up to 500%, against some countries.‚Äù Korolenko also highlighted the observed ‚Äústrong correlation‚Äù between one of the planet‚Äôs major stock indices, the S&P 500, and the price of Bitcoin (BTC). Cryptocurrency rates rise as investors exit ‚Äúsafe-haven‚Äù assets like gold and are willing to invest in more liquid instruments, with higher levels of risk and volatility, the broker remarked and shared his company‚Äôs forecast for the coming weeks: ‚ÄúBy the end of the year, our analysts expect Bitcoin to exceed $130,000. The uptrend will begin in the second half of November.‚Äù Cifra Markets is the first regulated crypto broker in CIS, the regional organization created after the dissolution of the USSR, which currently facilitates economic cooperation between over half of the former Soviet republics. The brokerage is registered in Belarus as a resident of the High-Tech Park ( HTP ) in Minsk. The hub provides a special legal regime and benefits for businesses in the IT space, including platforms operating with digital assets, since the Belarusian government regulated these activities in 2018. Cifra‚Äôs services are mainly targeting investors in the Russian Federation and other CIS countries, where crypto rules are at different stages of development. Belarus is the region‚Äôs leader in that respect, while Russia has only recently announced it‚Äôs going to comprehensively regulate its market next year. Russian crypto investor activity said to double in 2026 Alexey Korolenko pointed out that Belarus is a friendly nation to Russia, and its infrastructure is ‚Äúensuring protection and security for Russian investors.‚Äù Russia has been on the receiving end of Western sanctions over its invasion of Ukraine, which have restricted access to global finances and markets for its citizens and companies. It plans to regulate crypto investments next year, and Cifra Markets expects Russian investor activity to double by the end of 2026, as more products appear on the market, such as tokenized shares that can be traded with stablecoins like Tether (USDT). Korolenko praised the importance of ‚Äúhigh-quality regulation,‚Äù which increases trust in the crypto market and its recognition, elaborating: ‚ÄúSuch steps signal to all participants ‚Äì from banks to private investors ‚Äì that cryptocurrencies are becoming a fully-fledged part of the Russian financial world. They are no longer something semi-marginal, but clear and accepted tool, recognized not only by investors but also by regulators.‚Äù In terms of engagement with crypto instruments, Russia is one of the world‚Äôs leaders , the broker noted, emphasizing: ‚ÄúVarious indicators clearly show that the Russian market consistently ranks among the top three global cryptocurrency markets.‚Äù The CEO of Cifra is convinced that Russians‚Äô involvement in the trading of crypto assets like Bitcoin will continue to grow for two main reasons ‚Äì cryptocurrencies allow them to hedge geopolitical risks and provide them with access to a range of investment instruments beyond the reach of restrictions imposed by other nations. title: High Liquidity At This Level Could Send The XRP Price Surging Soon
body: Crypto analyst Steph has highlighted a high liquidity level that could spark a significant surge for the XRP price. This comes as the altcoin struggles to reclaim the psychological $3 level, which could lead to a further rally to new highs. Liquidity Level That Could Spark An XRP Price Surge In an X post, Steph revealed that the liquidity around $3.2 is expanding for the XRP price and that the market is charging toward the highest cluster. He explained that there are many buy and sell orders around this level, with market makers often looking to capture liquidity at price levels with significant liquidity clusters like this one. Related Reading: Are The XRP Tokens In Escrow At Risk Of Being Sold? Ripple CTO Shares Insights As such, the XRP price could rally to $3.2 at some point, reclaiming the $3 level in the process. However, the crypto market is currently on a downtrend, which makes this rally less unlikely for now. XRP has struggled to break out of its current range since the $19 billion liquidation event on October 10. Crypto analyst CasiTrades had recently predicted that the XRP price could still drop to as low as $1.4 before it records a bullish reversal. She claimed that this will set the stage for the next Wave 3 impulse that could send XRP toward $6.50 or $10. Meanwhile, for the projected XRP crash to be invalidated, the analyst stated that the altcoin needs to break and hold above $2.82. However, Steph revealed that the XRP price has formed a double bottom, which he predicts would lead to a reversal above $3. The analyst is also confident that XRP will reach a new all-time high (ATH), predicting a rally to $4.50 as he highlighted a compression on the chart. Why Current Price Action Is Still Bullish Crypto analyst Egrag Crypto revealed that the XRP price is making higher highs and that the RSI is also making higher highs, which he noted means strong bullish momentum and that buyers are still in control while the trend is healthy. He added that there is no bearish divergence, so momentum is confirming the price move. Related Reading: Why This Analyst Is More Bullish On XRP Over Ethereum For The Short-Term Egrag Crypto further remarked that when the XRP price and RSI rise together, the uptrend is real and supported by strength. He suggested that XRP holders should only be worried when the price makes higher highs but the RSI makes lower highs. He explained that this is when a bearish divergence could occur, indicating weakening momentum. Meanwhile, the analyst also mentioned that a close above between $2.65 and $2.70 with confirmation is key. At the time of writing, the XRP price is trading at around $2.5, down over 3% in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from Freepik, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Cardano Price Prediction: Crypto Analysts Point to Break Above Symmetrical Triangle and Bullish Accumulation ‚Äì Is ADA About to Hit $1 In November?
body: Cardano Price Prediction is turning bullish as ADA attempts to break above a three-month symmetrical triangle pattern , which will put an end to a prolonged accumulation phase. Analysts suggest that a confirmed breakout could trigger a 60% price surge, potentially driving ADA toward the $1 psychological level in November. At press time, Cardano trades at $0.6293, down 3% on the day and extending its monthly losses to over 20%. Cardano $1 Billion Daily Volume Confirms Bullish Accumulation Despite the dip, trading activity remains strong, with daily volumes exceeding $1 billion, reflecting sustained market interest. Source: Coingecko ADA also continues to hold its position as the 10th-largest cryptocurrency, with a market capitalization of $22.5 billion. Beyond solid price action, Cardano‚Äôs fundamentals are also strengthening. The blockchain has been advancing its vision for trust and security in the Internet of Things (IoT), especially as AI technologies enable machines to interact and transact online. During the Blockchain Life Forum in Dubai, Frederik Gregaard, CEO of the Cardano Foundation, emphasized this mission, stating, ‚ÄúTo create true abundance, we must learn from Bitcoin and embrace the vision ‚Äî a decentralized world where collaboration is intrinsically incentivized, and trust is built through cryptography.‚Äù "To create true abundance, we must learn from Bitcoin and embrace the vision‚Äîa decentralized world where collaboration is intrinsically incentivized, and trust is built through cryptography." Today, live from @BlLife_Forum in Dubai, CEO @F_Gregaard spoke on how this vision‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/UHT70duYiT ‚Äî Cardano Foundation (@Cardano_CF) October 28, 2025 Cardano Price Prediction: ADA‚Äôs 261% Gains Could Repeat in November Historically, November has been a high-performance month for Cardano, with ADA rallying 188% in November 2023 and 261% in November 2024. Source: X/ IMTYLERBURKE If history rhymes, this technical setup and renewed market optimism could position ADA for another explosive run into the end of the year. Looking at the Cardano/USDT daily chart, the technical picture shows ADA has recently tested and is now hovering around a key support zone marked between $0.595-$0.65, which previously acted as support from July through early October before the breakdown. After breaking below the middle resistance zone around $0.75-$0.85, the selling pressure intensified, pushing the price down to the current $0.64 levels. ADA is now staging a potential reversal from the support area, targeting a move back toward the $0.75-$0.85 resistance zone. However, this bullish scenario would require the current support level to hold firmly. If ADA can establish a base here and buyers step in with conviction, there‚Äôs room for a relief rally back toward the overhead resistance zones. PEPENODE Raises $2M To Help You Mine Crypto From Your Browser Cardano‚Äôs bullish reversal would mean OG cryptos like PEPE and its derivatives would also have a good run. Pepenode (PEPENODE) is a new MINE-TO-EARN memecoin that makes crypto mining easier for everyone. Instead of needing expensive computer equipment, PEPENODE turns mining into a simple online game that works with just a crypto wallet and an internet browser. You use PEPENODE tokens to purchase virtual mining nodes , and these nodes act as your digital mining setup. And you can improve them through your dashboard to increase their power. With the $PEPENODE presale, you can begin earning right away by running your virtual mining system or staking your tokens . Each $PEPENODE token currently costs $0.0011227, making this a good entry point before the token‚Äôs supply decreases and prices potentially rise. title: Ethereum Foundation Launches New Resource for Wall Street Firms: Details
body: The Ethereum Foundation is stepping up its outreach to traditional finance.¬†It has launched a new website designed to help institutions understand and use the Ethereum blockchain. The site, called institutions.ethereum.org , provides clear steps for banks, asset managers and corporations interested in Ethereum-based applications. The foundation says the goal is to make Ethereum the natural home for financial institutions entering the blockchain space. Ethereum Website Aims to Simplify Institutional Adoption The new website serves as a bridge between traditional finance and decentralised technology. It features a clean layout and focuses on real-world use cases. Visitors can look at examples of tokenised real-world assets (RWAs), stablecoins, defi products and privacy-focused tools built on Ethereum . A section called ‚ÄúDigital Assets‚Äù gives an overview of blockchain sectors, while another tab labeled ‚ÄúLive Data‚Äù tracks Ethereum‚Äôs role in the global digital economy. There is also a ‚ÄúLibrary‚Äù that hosts reports, insights and articles explaining how institutions are using the network. The foundation‚Äôs post on X described Ethereum as a ‚Äúneutral, secure base layer where the world‚Äôs financial value is coming on-chain.‚Äù It added that the site is built for ‚Äúbuilders, leaders and institutions advancing this global movement.‚Äù Ethereum‚Äôs Share of Institutional Blockchain Activity According to data featured on the site, Ethereum holds a dominant position in several blockchain categories. It supports 75% of all tokenised real-world asset activity, 65% of total DeFi value locked and 60% of stablecoin liquidity across the market. Ethereum shows live stats on its website | source: institutions.ethereum.org These numbers show why Ethereum continues to be the go-to platform for financial applications. It has a strong record of security, extensive developer support and a wide range of live projects already trusted by international brands. Some of the most prominent examples include Visa, which processes around $1 billion in stablecoin transactions annually on Ethereum. BlackRock also manages $1.15 billion in tokenised assets and Coinbase has Base, its layer 2 network securing $15.5 billion in total value locked. Ethereum Expands Its Institutional Focus The Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs Enterprise Acceleration team developed the website to make it easier for companies to transition from trad-fi systems to blockchain models. This stands as part of an effort to attract more institutions, while showcasing Ethereum‚Äôs enterprise-grade capabilities. Earlier this year, the foundation supported Etherealize, which is a startup dedicated to educating financial institutions about Ethereum‚Äôs infrastructure. Etherealize is aimed at connecting Wall Street firms with on-chain tools and data, while helping them test blockchain products in real environments. Growing Interest From Traditional Finance Wall Street‚Äôs interest in blockchain has increased after the passage of several new laws in the United States, related to digital assets. Financial giants like Citi, Zelle and Western Union have all announced new blockchain integrations in recent weeks. Ethereum markets itself as a leader in Stablecoins and defi | source: institutions.ethereum.org Citi recently partnered with Coinbase to build a stablecoin settlement layer. The partnership will allow faster payments and 24/7 fund transfers using tokenised dollars. Zelle and Western Union are also developing stablecoin-based transfer systems to make international payments cheaper and faster. These moves show how financial firms are taking advantage of blockchain solutions to improve settlement speed and transparency. The Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs website also comes at a time when many institutions are actively searching for guidance on how to use the technology safely.

title: Figma Revolutionizes Design with Breakthrough Weavy AI Acquisition
body: BitcoinWorld Figma Revolutionizes Design with Breakthrough Weavy AI Acquisition In the fast-evolving digital landscape, where innovation drives market shifts and investment opportunities, a significant development has emerged from the design world. Figma , a leading collaborative design platform, has announced its strategic Weavy acquisition , an AI-powered media generation company. This move signals a powerful convergence of design and artificial intelligence, echoing the disruptive potential seen across various tech sectors, including the dynamic cryptocurrency space. For those tracking market innovations and the future of digital creation, this integration promises to reshape how we think about design and media. Why the Figma Acquisition of Weavy Matters for Digital Design On the surface, it‚Äôs a standard tech acquisition, but the implications run deep. Figma , already a powerhouse in collaborative interface design, is now poised to integrate advanced AI capabilities directly into its ecosystem. This isn‚Äôt just about adding a new feature; it‚Äôs about fundamentally changing the creative workflow for millions of designers. By bringing Weavy‚Äôs technology under the new ‚ÄòFigma Weave‚Äô brand, Figma aims to offer a seamless experience from initial concept to final media generation, all within a unified platform. The deal sees 20 members of the Weavy team joining Figma, a testament to the talent and innovative spirit of the Tel Aviv-based startup. Founded in 2024, Weavy quickly made a name for itself, raising $4 million in a seed round from notable investors like Entr√©e Capital , Designer Fund , Founder Collective , and Fiverr founder Micha Kaufman . While the financial terms of the acquisition were not disclosed, the strategic value is clear: a deeper dive into AI-driven design. Unpacking Weavy‚Äôs Advanced AI Media Generation Capabilities Weavy isn‚Äôt just another AI tool; it offers a sophisticated suite of web-based functionalities that empower users to combine diverse AI models for high-quality image and video creation. This capability is crucial for designers working on product mockups, brand styling, or any visual content that demands precision and creativity. Here‚Äôs what makes Weavy‚Äôs approach to AI media generation particularly compelling: Combined AI Models: Users can leverage multiple AI models, such as Sora , Seedance, and Veo for video, and Flux, Ideogram, Nano-Banana, and Seedream for image generation. This allows for unparalleled flexibility and access to a broad spectrum of AI capabilities. Pro Editing Tools: Beyond mere generation, Weavy provides robust editing features. Designers can perform layer edits, adjust lighting, change colors, and modify angles using intuitive prompts, ensuring the final output perfectly matches their vision. Node-Based Workflow: This unique approach allows for creative exploration and iterative refinement. As Figma CEO Dylan Field highlighted, ‚ÄúThis node-based approach brings a new level of craft and control to AI generation. Outputs can be branched, remixed, and refined, combining creative exploration with iteration and craft.‚Äù Imagine starting with a text prompt for an image on an infinite canvas, exploring results from various models, selecting an image, and then seamlessly adding another prompt for video generation. At any stage, detailed editing tools allow for precise adjustments, making the creative process fluid and highly controlled. The Future of Design Platform Innovation: Figma Weave The integration of Weavy into Figma will eventually culminate in the ‚ÄòFigma Weave‚Äô brand, signifying a new chapter for the design platform . Initially, Weavy will operate as a standalone product, allowing its existing user base to continue their work. However, the long-term vision is clear: a deep integration that merges Weavy‚Äôs powerful AI tools with Figma‚Äôs collaborative design environment. This strategic move underscores Figma‚Äôs commitment to staying at the forefront of design technology. By embedding advanced AI capabilities, Figma aims to: Accelerate Workflows: Automate repetitive tasks and generate design elements more quickly. Enhance Creativity: Provide designers with new avenues for exploration and ideation, pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible. Democratize AI: Make sophisticated AI media generation accessible to a broader audience of designers, regardless of their technical expertise in AI models. The goal is to create a harmonious blend where AI assists and augments human creativity, rather than replacing it. This evolution solidifies Figma‚Äôs position as an indispensable tool for modern design teams. Beyond Weavy: The Rise of Generative AI in Creative Tools The Figma -Weavy deal is not an isolated incident but rather a clear indicator of a broader trend: the surging demand for AI-powered design platforms. The market for generative AI in creative applications is experiencing explosive growth, as companies seek to streamline media generation and enhance design workflows. This trend is driven by the need for speed, efficiency, and the ability to produce diverse creative outputs at scale. Recent months have seen several significant developments in this space: Perplexity‚Äôs Acquisition: Earlier this month, AI search platform Perplexity acquired the team behind the Sequoia-backed design platform Visual Electric , signaling a convergence of AI search and visual design. Krea‚Äôs Funding: In April, Krea announced it had raised an impressive $83 million across various funding rounds from prominent firms like Bain Capital , a16z , and Abstract Ventures , highlighting investor confidence in AI-driven creative tools. These developments collectively paint a picture of an industry undergoing rapid transformation, where AI is no longer a futuristic concept but a present-day reality shaping the tools and processes of creative professionals. FAQs on Figma‚Äôs Acquisition of Weavy Here are some common questions about this significant development: What is Weavy and what does it do? Weavy is an AI-powered media generation company that specializes in creating high-quality images and videos. It allows users to combine different AI models and offers professional editing tools to refine generated media for product mockups, brand styling, and other design needs. Why did Figma acquire Weavy? Figma acquired Weavy to integrate advanced AI media generation capabilities directly into its collaborative design platform. This move aims to enhance design workflows, accelerate content creation, and provide designers with more powerful tools for creative exploration and iteration. What is ‚ÄòFigma Weave‚Äô? Figma Weave is the new brand under which Weavy‚Äôs technology will operate and eventually be integrated into the broader Figma platform. It represents the convergence of Figma‚Äôs design tools with Weavy‚Äôs AI-powered media generation. What kind of AI models does Weavy use? Weavy utilizes various AI models for both image and video generation. For video, it includes models like Seedance, Sora , and Veo. For image generation, it uses models such as Flux, Ideogram, Nano-Banana, and Seedream. Will Weavy remain a standalone product? For now, Weavy will exist as a standalone product. In the future, it will be integrated with the Figma Weave brand and the rest of the Figma platform, offering a more unified experience. Who are the key people involved in this acquisition? Key figures include Dylan Field , CEO of Figma , and the team from Weavy , which includes 20 individuals joining Figma. Micha Kaufman , founder of Fiverr , was also an early investor in Weavy. Where can I learn more about similar tech innovations? Events like Bitcoin World Disrupt are excellent opportunities to hear from industry leaders and innovators. The event features speakers from companies like Google Cloud , Netflix , Microsoft , Box , a16z , ElevenLabs , Wayve , and Hugging Face , discussing topics vital for startup growth and technological advancement. Conclusion: A New Era for Creative Design The Figma Weavy acquisition marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of digital design. By integrating advanced AI media generation capabilities, Figma is not just expanding its feature set; it‚Äôs redefining the role of a design platform in the age of generative AI . This strategic move empowers designers with unprecedented control and creative freedom, promising to unlock new possibilities for visual content creation. As the lines between human intuition and artificial intelligence continue to blur, Figma Weave stands as a beacon for the future of collaborative and intelligent design. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models and institutional adoption. This post Figma Revolutionizes Design with Breakthrough Weavy AI Acquisition first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: LBank Labs Forges Strategic Partnership with WEthePeople Law Group to Elevate Legal Standards in the Crypto Ecosystem
body: Sinagapore, Sinagapore, October 30th, 2025, Chainwire LBank Labs , the innovation and investment arm of leading global cryptocurrency exchange LBank, today announced a strategic partnership with WEthePeople Law Group, a premier Korean law firm renowned for its expertise in international litigation and regulatory compliance. By combining LBank Labs' deep industry insights with WEthePeople's robust legal framework, the partnership will empower emerging technologies to navigate complex global regulations with confidence and precision. WEthePeople Law Group stands as a trusted ally in the legal landscape, serving as the strategic partner to Hausfeld, one of the world's most acclaimed international litigation firms. In the burgeoning crypto industry, WEthePeople delivers holistic, forward-thinking advisory services that address regulatory hurdles, cross-border transactions, and intellectual property safeguards‚Äîensuring clients thrive in an increasingly interconnected digital economy. As LBank's dedicated investment institution, LBank Labs plays a pivotal role in scouting and nurturing high-potential blockchain ventures. This alliance with WEthePeople underscores LBank Labs' unwavering dedication to excellence in global operations, particularly in expanding international business development and fortifying intellectual property protections. Czhang Lin, Head of LBank Labs, stated, "In the fast-evolving world of blockchain and crypto, robust legal partnerships are not just advantageous‚Äîthey are essential for sustainable innovation. Teaming up with WEthePeople, positions us to provide our portfolio companies and the broader ecosystem with comprehensive, globally attuned legal support." This partnership builds on LBank Labs' recent triumphs, including its successful hosting of the Global Blockchain Forum during Korea Blockchain Week (KBW) 2025 in Seoul which is co-organized with South Korean Congressman Min Byoung-Dug and the Korea Blockchain Industry Promotion Association (KBIPA). Looking Forward, LBank Labs will leverage this new alliance to host a series of hybrid forums and workshops throughout 2026, integrating legal deep dives into regulatory compliance, and ethical AI-blockchain integrations. About LBank Labs LBank Labs is a global Web3 venture capital firm with over $100 million in assets under management, focused on early-stage investments across compliant blockchain infrastructure, regulated DeFi applications, AI integration, and institutional-grade decentralized solutions. Its portfolio includes leading projects and funds that are helping develop the next generation of regulatory-aligned, scalable digital technologies. ContactPR & CommunicationsLBankpress@lbank.com Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: ETH Eyes $4,400 Territory While RWA Investors Chase Higher Yield ‚Äì Will ConstructKoin (CTK) Be the Next RWA Unicorn?
body: It‚Äôs been a thrilling year in crypto, one filled with more highs than lows and no shortage of volatility. ETH, having languished far behind BTC for the first half of the year, is now on the move and projected to finish the year higher after shrugging off the late October pullback that‚Äôs tempered the crypto market. Meanwhile, the search for sustainable onchain yield is gathering pace, with RWAs increasingly featuring in the mix. The ability to earn yield from real-world assets ‚Äì while using these same assets as collateral to mint stablecoins ‚Äì has been one of this year‚Äôs onchain success stories. As Q4 2025 hits high gear, another entrant to the RWA sector, ConstructKoin (CTK), has been capturing mindshare as its presale paves the way for real-estate tokenization on an industrial scale. With two months left in this year‚Äôs market cycle, investors are chasing assets that have yet to pump ‚Äì while the shrewdest among them are hedging their bets by allocating to a combination of crypto majors and emerging assets such as CTK that support portfolio diversification. But does this thesis hold weight? Let‚Äôs examine the evidence. ETH Consolidates as the Market Prepares to Move Up ETH is trading around $3,850 on October 30, 2025, having dipped slightly amidst a volatile week for crypto markets. Strong institutional inflows, however, have ensured there is significant support at this price level as ETFs continue acquiring vast amounts of Ethereum‚Äôs native asset. While it‚Äôs easy to find hyper-bullish price predictions for ETH on the web, one of the more rational, CoinCodex , projects ETH reaching $4,350 over the coming month. If it can reclaim that threshold and find a floor there, ETH looks odds-on to finish the year close to an all-time high and enter 2026 with fresh vigor. Institutions have been kept busy buying and selling ETH this month in response to investor demand, resulting in huge in- and outflows that have broadly balanced for the month. Having had all year to stock up on BTC, however, there is clear evidence that ETH is now receiving the same treatment, leaving it on course to grind higher as 2025 closes out. RWA Yield Stacks Up as ConstructKoin (CTK) Presale Comes Into Play Moving away from crypto majors and into the RWA sector that‚Äôs been ticking over all year, and there are clear signs that investors are seeking new yield opportunities. One of this year‚Äôs greatest success stories has been the integration of real-world assets with DeFi, allowing investors to earn yield from RWAs such as T-bills and commodities. While the yields available from synthetic stablecoin leaders Ethena and Falcon Finance has been the main story in this sector of late, there‚Äôs another player entering the game with the promise of even greater APYs for token holders. ConstructKoin (CTK) is in the ReFi business ‚Äì that‚Äôs real estate finance ‚Äì and is committed to launching its own stablecoin once its market cap reaches $100M. CTK holders who stake the native token will be eligible for up to 12% in yield, disbursed in USDT, which is derived from the real estate projects it finances. Having already secured $15M of assets onchain, it‚Äôs well on its way to fulfilling this goal. As its loan book grows in size, so will the interest available to investors. It‚Äôs another example of how real-world assets, including bricks and mortar, are being tokenized and in the process transformed into yield-bearing assets that allow astute investors to earn returns regardless of broader market conditions. As ConstructKoin‚Äôs development continues apace, 2025 looks poised to finish on a high note, with opportunities for ETH traders and RWA investors willing to fill their bags and wait for the market to do the rest. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Unpacking the Potential of Ethereum and RWA Investments in 2025
body: Ethereum's Resurgence After trailing behind Bitcoin in the earlier part of 2025, Ethereum has begun its ascent, eyeing the $4,400 mark. Despite a volatile October, Ethereum's resilience is notable, with its value hovering around $3,850 as of late October. Analysts from CoinCodex anticipate a potential climb to $4,350 by the end of November. The influx from ETFs and sustained institutional interest suggests a robust support for Ethereum's market price. Throughout October, the institutional activities around Ethereum have mirrored those typically associated with Bitcoin, hinting at a growing confidence among major investors towards Ethereum. Real World Assets (RWA) Gaining Traction The cryptocurrency sector is not just about virtual tokens; 2025 has seen a significant pivot towards integrating real-world assets (RWAs) into the blockchain. Platforms leveraging RWAs are creating new opportunities for yield. RWAs are becoming a critical part of investment strategies, blending traditional asset stability with the innovative potential of DeFi. Amidst these developments, ConstructKoin (CTK), which began its presale recently, is emerging as a significant player in the real estate tokenization arena, promoting a unique model of real estate finance (ReFi). The Promise of ConstructKoin (CTK) ConstructKoin is setting a benchmark in the RWA space by not only offering tokenization of real estate assets but also proposing attractive yields for its stakeholders. Initial reports suggest a yield of up to 12% in USDT for staking CTK tokens, funded by the revenues from financed real estate projects. With $15M already secured onchain, ConstructKoin is rapidly progressing towards its goal of a $100M market cap necessary for its stablecoin launch. This development represents not just growth for CTK but also for the crypto ecosystem, demonstrating a viable model of how traditional assets can enhance blockchain utility and investor returns. The innovative approach of companies like Ethena and Falcon Finance in the sector further underscores the potential of RWAs to reshape investment landscapes, providing more sustainable and diverse earning avenues. Final Thoughts As 2025 winds down, the dual narratives of Ethereum's price journey and the pioneering steps of RWA platforms like ConstructKoin are set to define the next phase of cryptocurrency investment. For investors, this era opens up new fronts - both in appreciating digital assets and tangible, yield-generating real assets. title: The Bitcoin ETFs Sold the Dip
body: The US bitcoin ETFs saw outflows of $470 million on Wednesday while bitcoin's price fell from $113k to currently trade at $108k.

title: Mastercard reports 17% year‚Äëover‚Äëyear gain as Q3 2025 revenue hits $8.6B
body: Mastercard on Thursday reported that it recorded $8.6 billion in net revenue last quarter, up by 17% from the same quarter last year, according to the company‚Äôs earnings report. The payments giant said the growth came from strong card spending across consumers and businesses, along with expanded services beyond payments. Net income reached $3.9 billion, rising from $3.3 billion, while diluted earnings per share were $4.34, compared to $3.53 a year ago. Fourteen analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research expected earnings of $4.31 per share, while eleven analysts expected revenue of $8.5 billion, meaning Mastercard beat two separate forecasts. Mike Miebach, the CEO, said the quarter showed continued demand across the company‚Äôs network and newer service categories. ‚ÄúThis quarter, these value-added services and solutions delivered net revenue growth of 25% year-over-year, or 22% on a currency-neutral basis,‚Äù Mike said. He also pointed out Mastercard launched the Mastercard Commerce Media network, introduced new cyber threat intelligence tools for payments, and expanded agentic commerce capabilities, describing these as aimed at helping customers ‚Äúunlock new buying centers.‚Äù Mastercard sees growth in payment network and services Mastercard reported that payment network net revenue increased 12%, or 10% on a currency-neutral basis, and it processed $2.7 trillion in gross dollar volume, which was 9% higher on a local currency basis than last year. Cross-border volume increased 15%, reflecting ongoing travel and international spending patterns. Switched transactions increased 10%, showing higher overall transaction activity across the network. Rebates and incentives offered to customers also increased. Mastercard said payment network rebates and incentives increased 16%, or 15% on a currency-neutral basis, with the company pointing to growth in key usage drivers along with renewed and new customer arrangements. The company said value-added services and solutions saw 25% revenue growth, or 22% currency-neutral. The growth included 3 percentage points from acquisitions, while the remaining increase came from demand in security, digital authentication, consumer engagement, business insights, and pricing services. Mike said these areas play a growing role in how Mastercard positions itself beyond card transactions alone. Mastercard‚Äôs operating income for the quarter came in $5.1 billion, compared to $4.0 billion a year ago, meaning a 26% surge, or 23% currency-neutral. The operating margin was 58.8%, up from 54.3% in Q3 2024. Expenses, taxes, adjusted performance, and card count Total operating expenses increased 5% from last year. The company said this came mainly from higher general and administrative costs. These costs in the prior year included a restructuring charge, and the company said this year‚Äôs expenses were partly offset by lower litigation provisions. Excluding special items, adjusted operating expenses increased 15%, or 14% currency-neutral, with 4 percentage points coming from acquisitions. The remaining increase reflected additional general and administrative expenses. Other income (expense) for the quarter was favorable by $76 million compared to last year. The company pointed to net gains on equity investments this year, compared to net losses in the same period of 2024, partly balanced by increased interest expense. Without the effect of those gains and losses, adjusted other income (expense) was unfavorable by $28 million due to higher interest expense. The effective tax rate for Q3 2025 was 21.5%, compared to 15.6% in the same period of 2024. The adjusted effective tax rate was 21.4%, compared to 16.3% last year. Mastercard said the higher rates in 2025 were mainly due to the 15% global minimum tax (Pillar 2 Rules) that took effect in Singapore and other jurisdictions this year, along with changes in the company‚Äôs geographic earnings mix. The company noted that the global minimum tax largely offset the reduction to its tax rate that would have resulted from an incentive grant received from the Singapore Ministry of Finance. The company closed the quarter with 3.6 billion Mastercard and Maestro-branded cards issued worldwide as of September 30, 2025. Sign up to Bybit and start trading with $30,050 in welcome gifts

title: Binance Alpha KITE: An Exciting Unveiling for Early-Stage Coin Trading
body: BitcoinWorld Binance Alpha KITE: An Exciting Unveiling for Early-Stage Coin Trading The cryptocurrency world is constantly evolving, with new opportunities emerging for traders who are keen to discover the next big thing. A significant development for those interested in cutting-edge digital assets is the recent announcement: Binance Alpha KITE is officially joining the platform. This addition promises to open new doors for investors looking to engage with early-stage coins within the secure and innovative environment of Binance Wallet. What is Binance Alpha KITE All About? Binance Alpha serves as a dedicated on-chain trading platform, specifically designed to identify and list promising early-stage cryptocurrencies. It operates directly within the Binance Wallet, offering users a seamless and integrated trading experience. The core mission of Binance Alpha is to provide a curated space where innovative projects can gain visibility and early liquidity. The addition of Binance Alpha KITE signifies a new chapter. KITE, as an asset, will now be accessible to a broader audience of traders who are actively seeking high-growth potential assets before they hit mainstream exchanges. This move reinforces Binance Alpha‚Äôs commitment to fostering innovation in the crypto ecosystem. Why is This KITE Listing Exciting for Traders? For many crypto enthusiasts, the appeal of early-stage coins lies in their potential for substantial returns. The Binance Alpha KITE listing offers several compelling advantages: Early Access: Traders can gain exposure to KITE much earlier than they might on other, larger exchanges. Integrated Platform: Being part of the Binance Wallet means enhanced security and convenience for users. Curated Selection: Binance Alpha‚Äôs focus on early-stage projects suggests a level of vetting, potentially reducing some risks associated with unknown assets. Growth Potential: Early listings often precede significant price movements as projects gain traction and adoption. This integration aims to empower users by giving them the tools to explore and invest in nascent projects with confidence. Navigating Early-Stage Crypto: Challenges and Opportunities with Binance Alpha KITE While the potential rewards are high, trading early-stage coins also comes with inherent challenges. Volatility is often higher, and projects can be less established. However, platforms like Binance Alpha mitigate some of these concerns by providing a structured environment. The opportunity presented by Binance Alpha KITE is twofold: it allows for participation in a project‚Äôs early growth phase, and it does so within a reputable ecosystem. Users are encouraged to conduct their own research and understand the project fundamentals before investing. How to Get Started with Binance Alpha KITE Trading? Ready to explore the possibilities with KITE? Here‚Äôs a general guide to help you begin your journey on Binance Alpha: Access Binance Wallet: Ensure you have the Binance Wallet installed and set up. Navigate to Binance Alpha: Locate the Binance Alpha section within your wallet interface. Fund Your Wallet: Deposit the necessary cryptocurrencies to begin trading. Search for KITE: Find KITE among the listed early-stage coins. Conduct Due Diligence: Review KITE‚Äôs project details, whitepaper, and community sentiment. Place Your Trade: Execute your buy order for KITE, keeping in mind market conditions. Always remember to start with an amount you are comfortable losing, as early-stage investments carry higher risk. The addition of KITE to Binance Alpha marks an exciting moment for the platform and its users. By providing a dedicated gateway to early-stage coins, Binance Alpha continues to position itself as a key player in fostering innovation and offering unique trading opportunities. This strategic move not only enhances the platform‚Äôs offerings but also empowers traders to potentially discover the next groundbreaking crypto asset. The future of decentralized finance is bright, and platforms like Binance Alpha are paving the way. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Binance Alpha? A1: Binance Alpha is an on-chain trading platform integrated within the Binance Wallet, specifically designed to list and facilitate trading of early-stage cryptocurrencies. Q2: What kind of coins does Binance Alpha list? A2: It focuses on listing early-stage coins, offering traders the chance to invest in projects with high growth potential before they become widely available. Q3: Is KITE an early-stage coin? A3: Yes, with its addition to Binance Alpha, KITE is being presented as an early-stage coin available for trading on this specialized platform. Q4: What are the benefits of trading early-stage coins on Binance Alpha? A4: Benefits include early access to promising projects, integrated trading within Binance Wallet, a curated selection process, and potential for significant returns. Q5: What are the risks associated with trading early-stage coins? A5: Early-stage coins often come with higher volatility and less established track records, meaning they carry higher investment risks. Always do your own research. Don‚Äôt keep this exciting news to yourself! Share this article with your fellow crypto enthusiasts and traders on social media to spread the word about the latest opportunities on Binance Alpha. Your shares help our community grow and stay informed about crucial market developments. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping early-stage coins and their price action . This post Binance Alpha KITE: An Exciting Unveiling for Early-Stage Coin Trading first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

Bittensor (TAO) historic price sentiment TAO price history The TAO token was launched by the Bittensor network on March 6, 2023, with an opening price of $93.4. Within one week of its launch, TAO dipped below its opening price to the $76 range, decreasing its market capitalization. By the start of April 2024, TAO lost 50% of its value as its price stepped down to $47. In May, TAO stepped further down to $30.83 (the lowest value) but started to recover slowly, reaching only $63 by the end of the month. In July 2024, TAO recovered up to $86.18, just shy of its opening price, before dipping again. TAO traded in the nearly $54 range till October, after which it started to spike. Finally, in November 2023, TAO reached the $95 range and peaked at $379 on December 15. TAO price movements remained in a downtrend till mid-January 2024 before spiking to an all-time high of $757.60 on March 7, 2024, its highest price paid. By April 2024, Bittensor TAO lost almost 25% of its value again by dipping to $522. For May, June, and July, the token continued covering a range downward while making small spikes in between, reaching $216 at the start of July. TAO jumped to $357 on July 19, while slipping back to $281 by the end of August 2024. While the coin traded near the $265 range at the start of September. In October 2024, Bittensor (TAO) rose to the $660 range before closing at $468, as per the crypto market data, as market sentiment was slightly negative. In November, TAO rose to a high of $679, but it closed the year at the $440.69 mark on December 31, 2024. TAO opened 2025 at $439.73, peaked at $565 in January, and its price decreased to the $324 level in February. In March, TAO dipped to the $259 mark and descended further to $228 in April; however, in May, it recovered to $467 as the Bittensor market revived. At the start of October 2025, TAO/USD is trading near the $300 range, and current Bittensor sentiment is bearish.
